original: stong pa nyid nyid lce'o //🔽lus lus kyis stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid lce'o // lus lus kyis stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is the tongue.🔽The body is empty of the body.

original: lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus ma lags /
analyzed: lus kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang lus ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the body is not the body.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang lus ma mchis te /🔽lus nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang lus ma mchis te / lus nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The body is not other than emptiness.🔽The body itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid lus so //🔽yid yid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid lus so // yid yid kyis stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is the body.🔽The mind is empty of the mind.

original: yid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid ma lags /
analyzed: yid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the mind is not the mind.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang yid ma mchis te /🔽yid nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang yid ma mchis te / yid nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The mind is not other than emptiness.🔽The mind itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid yid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid yid do //
translated: Emptiness itself is the mind.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mig la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mig la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: “Blessed One, for these reasons, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not settle on the eyes,

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: and should not settle on the ears, nose, tongue, body, or mind.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ste /
translated: Blessed One, in this way, form is empty of form.

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of form is not form.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang gzugs ma mchis te /🔽gzugs nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang gzugs ma mchis te / gzugs nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Form is not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is form.

original: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so //🔽sgra sgras stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so // sgra sgras stong ste /
translated: Form is emptiness.🔽Sound is empty of sound.

original: sgra'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sgra ma lags /
analyzed: sgra'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sgra ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of sound is not sound.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sgra ma mchis te /🔽sgra nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sgra ma mchis te / sgra nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Sound is not other than emptiness.🔽Sound itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid sgra'o //🔽dri dris stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid sgra'o // dri dris stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is sound.🔽Smell is empty of smell.

original: dri'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dri ma lags /
analyzed: dri'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dri ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of smell is not smell.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang dri ma mchis te /🔽dri nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang dri ma mchis te / dri nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Smell is not other than emptiness.🔽Smell itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid dri'o //🔽ro ros stong ste /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid dri'o // ro ros stong ste /
translated: Emptiness itself is smell.🔽Taste is empty of taste.

original: ro'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ro ma lags /
analyzed: ro'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ro ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of taste is not taste.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang ro ma mchis te /🔽ro nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang ro ma mchis te / ro nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Taste is not other than emptiness.🔽Taste itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid ro'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid ro'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is taste.

original: reg reg gis stong ste /
analyzed: reg reg gis stong ste /
translated: It is empty of the emptiness of contact.

original: reg gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang reg ma lags /
analyzed: reg gi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang reg ma lags /
translated: That emptiness of contact is not contact.🔽Contact is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang reg ma mchis te /🔽reg nyid @135b stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang reg ma mchis te / reg nyid @135b stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than contact.

original: stong pa nyid nyid reg go //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid reg go //
translated: Contact is emptiness; emptiness is contact.

original: chos chos kyis stong ste /
analyzed: chos chos kyis stong ste /
translated: “Dharmas are empty of dharmas.

original: chos kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos ma lags /
translated: That emptiness of dharmas is not dharmas.🔽Dharmas are not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang chos ma mchis te /🔽chos nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang chos ma mchis te / chos nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than dharmas.

original: stong pa nyid nyid chos so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid chos so //
translated: Dharmas are emptiness; emptiness is dharmas.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: “Blessed One, for these reasons bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not settle on form,

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: and should not settle on sound, smell, taste, texture, or mental phenomena.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: “Blessed One, eye consciousness is empty of eye consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the eye consciousness is not the eye consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang mig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis te /🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang mig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis te / mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The eye consciousness is not other than emptiness.🔽The eye consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste /
translated: The ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, and thinking consciousness are empty of the thinking consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the thinking consciousness is not the thinking consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis te /🔽yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis te / yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The thinking consciousness is not other than emptiness.🔽The thinking consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the thinking consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs nges na /
translated: “Blessed One, in that case,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not settle on eye consciousness,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: and should not settle on ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, or mind consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
translated: Blessed One, it is because eye contact is empty of eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of eye contact is not eye contact.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis te /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa @136a * //🔽nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis te / mig gi 'dus te reg pa @136a * // nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Eye contact is not elsewhere apart from emptiness.🔽Emptiness is not elsewhere apart from eye contact.🔽Eye contact itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste /
translated: and the thinking-mind component is empty of the thinking-mind component.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the thinking-mind component is not the thinking-mind component.🔽The thinking-mind component is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis te /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis te / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the thinking-mind component.

original: stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o//
translated: The thinking-mind component is emptiness, and emptiness is the thinking-mind component.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: “Blessed One, for these reasons, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not abide in the eye component,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: or the union of the mind and dharmas.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor bas stong ste /
translated: “Blessed One, in the same way, the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the eye and forms is empty of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the eye and forms.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the eye and forms is not the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the eye and forms.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the eye and forms is not other than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis te /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis te / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the eye and forms.🔽The feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the eye and forms is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of the eye and forms.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor bas stong ste /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor bas stong ste /
translated: The condition of contact at the ear is empty of the condition of contact at the ear. The condition of contact at the nose is empty of the condition of contact at the nose. The condition of contact at the tongue is empty of the condition of contact at the tongue. The condition of contact at the body is empty of the condition of contact at the body. The condition of contact at the mind is empty of the condition of contact at the mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the condition of contact at the mind as a condition for feeling is not the condition of contact at the mind as a condition for feeling.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis te /🔽yid kyi 'dus @136b te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis te / yid kyi 'dus @136b te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The condition of contact at the mind as a condition for feeling is not elsewhere other than emptiness.🔽The condition of contact at the mind as a condition for feeling is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is itself the condition of contact at the mind as a condition for feeling.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Blessed One, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: should not settle on the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: and should not settle on the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact, or the feeling that arises from the condition of thinking-mind contact.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ste /
translated: Blessed One, the earth element is empty of the earth element.

original: sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sa'i khams ma lags /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sa'i khams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the earth element is not the earth element.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sa'i khams ma mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sa'i khams ma mchis te /
translated: The earth element is not other than emptiness.

original: sa'i khams nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sa'i khams nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The earth element itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid sa'i khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid sa'i khams so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the earth element.

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste /
translated: The water element, the fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element are empty of the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the consciousness element is not the consciousness element.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis te /🔽rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis te / rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The consciousness element is not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is the consciousness element.

original: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: The consciousness element itself is emptiness.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: “Blessed One, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the earth element,

original: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: nor should they abide in the water element, the fire element, the wind element, or the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not settle on the element of consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ste /
translated: Blessed One, in this way, ignorance is empty of ignorance.

original: ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ma rig pa ma lags /
analyzed: ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang ma rig pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of ignorance is not ignorance.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang ma rig pa ma mchis te /🔽ma rig pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang ma rig pa ma mchis te / ma rig pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Ignorance is not elsewhere than emptiness.🔽Ignorance itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid ma rig pa'o //🔽'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming @137a * //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid ma rig pa'o // 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming @137a * //
translated: Emptiness itself is ignorance.

original: dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi rga shis stong ste /
analyzed: dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi rga shis stong ste /
translated: Conditioned action, consciousness, name and form, the six sense sources, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and aging and death are empty of aging and death.

original: rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rga shi ma lags /
analyzed: rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rga shi ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of aging and death is not aging and death.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rga shi ma mchis te /🔽rga shi nyid stong pa nyid //
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rga shi ma mchis te / rga shi nyid stong pa nyid //
translated: Aging and death are not elsewhere than emptiness.🔽Aging and death itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid rga shi'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rga shi'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is aging and death.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Blessed One, for these reasons,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: “Moreover, Lord, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in ignorance,

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: should not stand in volitional factors, consciousness, name and form, the six sense fields, contact, feeling, craving, appropriation, existence, birth, and old age and death.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: “Moreover, Lord, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: and why?

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: Lord, it is because the four establishments of mindfulness are empty of the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags /
translated: That emptiness of the applications of mindfulness is not the applications of mindfulness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis te /🔽dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis te / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are not other than emptiness.🔽The applications of mindfulness are empty of the applications of mindfulness.🔽Emptiness is the applications of mindfulness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are emptiness.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Blessed One, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: should not stand in the applications of mindfulness.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
translated: Similarly, they should not abide in the four right efforts, the four legs of miraculous power, the five faculties, the five powers, the seven aspects of awakening, the noble eightfold path, the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, or the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽@137b bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / @137b bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: And why?🔽Blessed One, it is because the distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the distinct attributes of a buddha is not the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma mchis te /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma mchis te / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The unentangled qualities of the Buddha are not other than emptiness.🔽The unentangled qualities of the Buddha are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is the unentangled qualities of the Buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: For this reason, Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in the unentangled qualities of the Buddha.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Blessed One, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in the perfection of generosity.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /
translated: Blessed One, the perfection of generosity is empty of the perfection of generosity.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of giving is not the perfection of giving.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis te /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis te / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The perfection of giving is not other than emptiness.🔽The perfection of giving itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: “They should not stand in the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste /
translated: Because, Blessed One, the perfection of wisdom is empty of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags /
translated: That emptiness which is the perfection of wisdom is not the perfection of wisdom.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis te /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not other than emptiness.🔽The perfection of wisdom itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu @138a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu @138a * //
translated: Blessed One, for this reason🔽the bodhisattva great beings

original: phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: who practice the perfection of wisdom

original: pha rol tu phyin pa dug la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa dug la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: should not settle on the perfections.🔽Blessed One, for this reason🔽the bodhisattva great beings

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: who practice the perfection of wisdom

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
translated: should not settle on the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not stand in the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Lord, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in the letters.

original: yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: They should not stand in the accomplishment of the letters.

original: gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: gcig tu brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: They should not stand in the expression of one,

original: gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
analyzed: gnyis su brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi /
translated: they should not stand in the expression of two,

original: tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: tha dad du brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: they should not stand in the expression of many.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yi ge rnams yi ge rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: Lord, it is because the letters are empty of the letters.

original: yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yi ge rnams ma lags /
analyzed: yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yi ge rnams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the letters is not the letters.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang yi ge rnams ma mchis te /🔽yi ge rnams nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang yi ge rnams ma mchis te / yi ge rnams nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The letters are not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness is not the letters.

original: stong pa nyid nyid yi ge rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid yi ge rnams so //
translated: The letters are not other than emptiness.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: “Blessed One, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the letters.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: “Moreover, Blessed One, great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom

original: mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi ste / de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: should not abide in the extrasensory powers.

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste /
translated: If one were to ask why, Blessed One, it is because the extrasensory powers are empty of the extrasensory powers.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the superknowledges is not the superknowledges.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis te /🔽mngon par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis te / mngon par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The superknowledges are not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness is not other than the superknowledges.🔽The superknowledges themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid mngon par shes pa rnams so //🔽bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid mngon par shes pa rnams so // bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Emptiness itself is the superknowledges.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi @138b pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o //🔽bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi @138b pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o // bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: “For this reason, Lord, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in the superknowledges.

original: gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: “Furthermore, Lord, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in the idea ‘form is impermanent.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: Lord, it is because the impermanence of form is empty of the impermanence of form.

original: gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags de yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags de yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the impermanence of form is not the impermanence of form.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang gzugs mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: The impermanence of form is not other than emptiness.

original: gzugs mi rtag pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The impermanence of form is empty of the impermanence of form.

original: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is indeed the impermanence of form.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Blessed One, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not dwell on the notion that form is impermanent.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: They should not dwell on the notion that feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness is impermanent.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: Blessed One, it is because the impermanence of consciousness is empty of the impermanence of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma rtag pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma rtag pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the impermanence of consciousness is not the impermanence of consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: The impermanence of consciousness is not elsewhere, not apart from emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The impermanence of consciousness is empty of the impermanence of consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the impermanence of consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: For this reason, Blessed One,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in ‘consciousness is impermanent.’

original: de bzhin du gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: Blessed One, it is because the suffering of form is empty of the suffering of form.

original: gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags te /
analyzed: gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags te /
translated: The emptiness of the suffering of form is not the suffering of form.

analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang gzugs sdug bsngal @139a * // ba nyid ma mchis te / gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The suffering of form is not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness is not the suffering of form.

original: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs sdug bsngal ba nyid do //
translated: The suffering of form is emptiness, and emptiness is the suffering of form.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Bhagavān, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice the perfection of wisdom should not abide in the notion that ‘form is suffering.’

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: They should not abide in the notion that ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are suffering.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyis stong ste /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma lags /

analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid ma mchis te / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The nature of consciousness is not other than emptiness.🔽The nature of consciousness is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the nature of consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Blessed One, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not dwell on the notion that ‘consciousness is suffering.’

original: de bzhin du gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /

analyzed: gzugs bdag med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags po de yang gzugs bdag med pa nyid ma lags /

analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan yang gzugs bdag med pa nyid ma mchis te / gzugs bdag med pa nyid stong pa nyid /

analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs bdag med pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the intrinsic nature of form is the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of form.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Bhagavān, for these reasons

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //

analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /

original: rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Consciousness is empty of consciousness.🔽Emptiness is not consciousness.🔽Consciousness is not emptiness.🔽Apart from consciousness, there is no emptiness.🔽Apart from emptiness, there is no consciousness.🔽Consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid do //🔽bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid do // bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Emptiness itself is consciousness.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa nyid do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: “Thus, Blessed One, for these reasons great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the notion that ‘consciousness is signless.’

original: gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste / de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: They should not abide in the notion that ‘form is aspirationless.’

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs smon pa med pa nyid gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs smon pa med pa nyid gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: If one were to ask why, it is because the signlessness of form is empty of the signlessness of form.

original: gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs smon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the signlessness of form is not the signlessness of form.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang gzugs smon pa med pa nyid mchis te /
translated: The signlessness of form is not elsewhere apart from emptiness.

original: gzugs smon pa med pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs smon pa med pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The signlessness of form is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs smon pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs smon pa med pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness itself is form.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Blessed One, for this reason

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //🔽tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / @141a * //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o // tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / @141a * //
translated: bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not dwell on the notion that ‘form is wishless. ’🔽They should not dwell on the notion that ‘feeling, perception,

original: 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: volitional factors, and consciousness are wishless. ’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: Blessed One, it is because the wishlessness of consciousness is empty of the wishlessness of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa snon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa snon pa med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid ma lags /
translated: That emptiness of the wishlessness of consciousness is not the wishlessness of consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid ma mchis te /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid ma mchis te /
translated: The wishlessness of consciousness is not elsewhere apart from emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Consciousness is the emptiness of the absence of expectancy.

original: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the absence of expectancy is consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: For these reasons,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa smon pa med do zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: Lord, the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in ‘consciousness is without expectancy.’

original: gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: They should not stand in ‘form is isolated.’

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs dben pa nyid gzugs dben pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs dben pa nyid gzugs dben pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: Lord, it is because the isolation of form is empty of the isolation of form.

original: gzugs dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: gzugs dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang gzugs dben pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the isolation of form is not the isolation of form.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang gzugs dben pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽gzugs dben pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang gzugs dben pa nyid ma mchis te / gzugs dben pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The isolation of form is not elsewhere than emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the isolation of form is the isolation of form.

original: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs dben pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs dben pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness itself is the isolation of form.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: “Blessed One, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the notion that physical forms are void.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi ste / de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: They should not abide in the notion that feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness are void.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: If one were to ask why, Blessed One, it is because the voidness of consciousness is void of the voidness of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The voidness of the voidness of consciousness is not the voidness of consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid ma mchis te / rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The voidness of consciousness is not other than the voidness of consciousness.🔽The voidness of consciousness is the voidness of consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid do //
translated: The voidness of consciousness is the voidness of consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das @141b rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das @141b rnam grangs des na /
translated: “Blessed One, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa dben no zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the notion that consciousness is void.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste / de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: “Moreover, Blessed One, great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in suchness.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: If one were to ask why, Blessed One, it is because suchness is empty of suchness.

original: de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang de bzhin nyid ma lags /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang de bzhin nyid ma lags /
translated: That emptiness of suchness is not suchness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang de bzhin nyid ma mchis te /🔽de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang de bzhin nyid ma mchis te / de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Neither is suchness other than emptiness.🔽Suchness is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid nyid de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid de bzhin nyid do //
translated: and emptiness is suchness.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Blessed One, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: “Lord, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in suchness.

original: de bzhin du chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: Similarly, they should not stand in the true dharmic nature.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos nyid chos nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: Lord, the true dharmic nature is empty of the true dharmic nature.

original: chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos nyid ma lags /
analyzed: chos nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos nyid ma lags /
translated: That emptiness of the true dharmic nature is not the true dharmic nature.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang chos nyid ma mchis te /🔽chos nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang chos nyid ma mchis te / chos nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The true dharmic nature is not other than emptiness.🔽The true dharmic nature is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid chos nyid do //🔽bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid chos nyid do // bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Emptiness itself is the true dharmic nature.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: “Lord, for these reasons bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in the true dharmic nature.

original: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi ste /
translated: Similarly, they should not stand in the dharma-constituent.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste /
translated: “Blessed One, the dharma-constituent is empty of the dharma-constituent.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the dharma-constituent is not the dharma-constituent.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te /🔽chos kyi dbyings nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te / chos kyi dbyings nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The dharma-constituent is not other than emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is the dharma-constituent.

original: stong pa nyid nyid chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The dharma-constituent itself is emptiness.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Blessed One, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos kyi dbyings la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the dharma-constituent.

original: de bzhin du chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽bcom @142a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi ste / de ci'i slad du zhe na / bcom @142a * //
translated: Similarly, they should not abide in the faultless nature of phenomena.

original: ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos skyon med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
analyzed: ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chos skyon med pa nyid chos skyon med pa nyid kyis stong ste /
translated: If you ask why, Blessed One, it is because the faultless nature of phenomena is empty of the faultless nature of phenomena.

original: chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags /
analyzed: chos skyon med pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang chos skyon med pa nyid ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the flawlessness of phenomena is not the flawlessness of phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang chos skyon med pa nyid ma mchis te /🔽chos skyon med pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang chos skyon med pa nyid ma mchis te / chos skyon med pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The flawlessness of phenomena is not other than emptiness.🔽The flawlessness of phenomena is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid chos skyon med pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid chos skyon med pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the flawlessness of phenomena.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Blessed One, for these reasons

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: great bodhisattva beings who practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom should not abide in the flawlessness of phenomena.

original: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste /🔽de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi ste / de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Similarly, they should not abide in the finality of existence.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mtha' yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste /
translated: If one were to ask why, Blessed One, it is because the finality of existence is empty of the finality of existence.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags /
translated: The emptiness of the finality of existence is not the finality of existence.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma mchis te /🔽yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma mchis te / yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Apart from emptiness, there is no perfect reality.🔽Perfect reality itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid yang dag pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid yang dag pa'i mtha'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is perfect reality.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na /
translated: Blessed One, for this reason

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o //
translated: the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in the perfect reality.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Blessed One, moreover, if bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na /
analyzed: thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na /
translated: are not skilled in means and stand in form with a mind that is based on the view of a self and what belongs to a self,

original: de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: they practice the accumulation of form, but do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na /
analyzed: gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na /
translated: If they stand in feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness,

original: de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: they are practicing the performance of consciousness, not practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par mi 'gyur /
translated: Because the bodhisattva great being who is practicing the performance does not get hold of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: He does not get fully into the meditative development of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par @142b ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par @142b ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Without having completed the perfection of wisdom he does not issue forth to the knowledge of all modes.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su ma bzung ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su ma bzung ba'o //
translated: Because, Lord, form is not something to be seized on.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su ma bzung ba'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su ma bzung ba'o //
translated: feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are not appropriated.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gzugs kyi 'dzin pa med pa gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'dzin pa med pa gang lags pa de yang gzugs ma lags te /
translated: The non-appropriation of form is not form,

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du'o //
translated: because of the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma lags te /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pa gang lags pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma lags te /
translated: The non-appropriation of feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness is not consciousness,

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du'o //
translated: because of the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi bar ni yongs su ma bzung ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi bar ni yongs su ma bzung ba'o //
translated: Similarly, up to the very limit of reality is not appropriated.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su 'dzin pa med pa gang lags pa de yang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags te /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i yongs su 'dzin pa med pa gang lags pa de yang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags te /
translated: The non-appropriation of the very limit of reality is not the very limit of reality,

original: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du'o //
translated: because of the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su ma bzung ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su ma bzung ba'o //
translated: That perfection of wisdom is not appropriated because it is empty of a basic nature.

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Blessed One, if bodhisattva great beings, when practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la gnas na /
analyzed: thabs mi mkhas pas bdag tu bgyi ba dang / bdag gir bgyi ba la gnas pa'i yid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar la gnas na /
translated: with a mind that is not skilled in means and is based on the view of a real self and what belongs to it, were to stand in the very limit of reality,

original: de yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
analyzed: de yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod kyi /
translated: they would practice the establishment of the very limit of reality.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spong ngo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spong ngo //
translated: They would not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin par mi 'gyur /
translated: Why is that?🔽Bodhisattva great beings who practice the establishment of the very limit of reality will not be embraced by the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
translated: They will not enter into the yoga of the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Without the perfection of wisdom being complete, the knowledge of all aspects will not come about.

original: bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: Blessed One, thus should bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du yongs su brtag par bgyi ste /🔽ci nas kyang chos gang @143a * //
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du yongs su brtag par bgyi ste / ci nas kyang chos gang @143a * //
translated: investigate all phenomena as emptiness by nature.
