original: la yang yid rnam par mi rgyu ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o //
analyzed: la yang yid rnam par mi rgyu ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o //
translated: They should investigate in such a way that their minds do not move toward any phenomenon.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste /
translated: Blessed One, this is the bodhisattva great beings’ meditative absorption called the unapprehending domain of phenomena.

original: yangs pa / rgya che ba /
analyzed: yangs pa / rgya che ba /
translated: It is vast and extensive,

original: mdun du bgyis pa /
analyzed: mdun du bgyis pa /
translated: is brought to the fore,

original: tshad ma mchis par nges pa /
analyzed: tshad ma mchis par nges pa /
translated: is certain beyond measure,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa ste /
translated: and cannot be taken away by any hearers or solitary buddhas.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice this maṇḍala of samādhi

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: will emerge in omniscience.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
translated: That omniscience is because of the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
translated: Because of the emptiness of non-rejection, the emptiness of inherent nature, the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of non-existent things, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of own-nature, and the emptiness of other-nature, it is not appropriated.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su ma bzung ba'o zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su ma bzung ba'o zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: This is the distinctive object and aspect of the lesser stage of peak.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mtshan mar gzung bar bgyi ba ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mtshan mar gzung bar bgyi ba ma lags te /
translated: Blessed One, it is because the knowledge of all aspects is not to be grasped with characteristics.

original: mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa lags so //
analyzed: mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa lags so //
translated: The signs are the afflictions.

original: mtshan ma de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: mtshan ma de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What are those signs?

original: gzugs ni mtshan ma'o //🔽tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni mtshan ma'o // tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Form is a sign.🔽Feeling is a sign.

original: 'du shes ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Perception is a sign.

original: 'du byed rnams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Formations are a sign.

original: rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Consciousness is a sign.

original: mig ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mig ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The eyes are a sign.

original: rna ba ni mtshan ma'o //🔽sna ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rna ba ni mtshan ma'o // sna ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The ears are a sign.🔽The nose is a sign.

original: lce ni mtshan ma'o//
analyzed: lce ni mtshan ma'o//
translated: The tongue is a sign.

original: @143b lus ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: @143b lus ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The body is a sign.

original: yid ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: yid ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The mind is a sign.

original: gzugs ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Form is a sign.

original: sgra ni mtshan ma'o //🔽dri ni mtshan ma'o //🔽ro ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sgra ni mtshan ma'o // dri ni mtshan ma'o // ro ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Sound is a sign.🔽Smell is a sign.🔽Taste is a sign.

original: reg ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: reg ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Touch is a sign.

original: chos ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: chos ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Mental phenomena are a sign.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Eye consciousness is a sign.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, and mind consciousness are signs.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The contact that is the coming together of the eye is a sign.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The contact that is the coming together of the ear, the contact that is the coming together of the nose, the contact that is the coming together of the tongue, the contact that is the coming together of the body, and the contact that is the coming together of the mind is a sign.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of the eye is a sign.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /
translated: The feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of the ear, the feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of the nose, the feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of the tongue, the feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of the body,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: and the feeling that arises from the contact that is the coming together of the mind is a sign.

original: sa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The earth element is a sign.

original: chu'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: chu'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The water element is a sign.

original: me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The fire element, the wind element, the space element, and the consciousness element are signs.

original: ma rig pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: ma rig pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Ignorance is a sign.

original: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Conditionings, consciousness, name-and-form, the six sense spheres, contact, feeling, craving, grasping, becoming, birth, and old age and death are signs.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The perfection of giving is a sign.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are signs.

original: nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Inner emptiness is a sign.

original: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: Outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature are signs.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni mtshan ma'o //
translated: The applications of mindfulness are signs.

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / @144a * //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / @144a * //
translated: the legs of manifest ability, the faculties, the powers, the seven aspects of enlightenment,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / yi ge rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / yi ge rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /
translated: the noble eightfold path, the perfections, the clairvoyances, the letters, the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nyid du chos nges pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mtshan ma ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nyid du chos nges pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mtshan ma ste /
translated: the distinct attributes of a buddha, emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, the dharma-constituent, the certification of phenomena just as they are, and the very limit of reality are a causal sign.

original: 'di ni nyon mongs pa zhes brjod pa lags so //
analyzed: 'di ni nyon mongs pa zhes brjod pa lags so //
translated: This is called an affliction.

original: gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mtshan mar gzung ba zhig lags na ni /
analyzed: gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mtshan mar gzung ba zhig lags na ni /
translated: If the perfection of wisdom were something to be apprehended as a causal sign,

original: kun tu rgyu phreng ba can bstan pa 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kun tu rgyu phreng ba can bstan pa 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The wandering mendicant Maṇi-dhvaja will not attain faith in the wisdom of omniscience in this teaching.

original: dad pa yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: dad pa yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is faith?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dad par byed pa nyid dang / rtogs pa nyid dang / mos pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par dad par byed pa nyid dang / rtogs pa nyid dang / mos pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa ste /
translated: It is the very faith in the perfection of wisdom, the very realization, the aspiration, the thought, the evaluation, and the investigation.

original: de yang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags /
analyzed: de yang mtshan ma'i tshul du ma lags /
translated: Moreover, it is not in the manner of a sign.

original: mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du yang ma lags te /
analyzed: mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du yang ma lags te /
translated: It is not even in the manner of the absence of a sign.

original: de ltar mtshan ma med par gzung ba lags so //
analyzed: de ltar mtshan ma med par gzung ba lags so //
translated: Thus, it is grasped as signless.

original: de ltar mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med par yongs su bzung bar ma mchis pas yongs su bzung ba ma lags so zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med par yongs su bzung bar ma mchis pas yongs su bzung ba ma lags so zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Thus, since it is not grasped as either a sign or the absence of a sign, it is not grasped.

original: 'dir kun tu rgyu phreng ba can dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba lhag par mos nas nyi tshe'i shes pas zhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: 'dir kun tu rgyu phreng ba can dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba lhag par mos nas nyi tshe'i shes pas zhugs par gyur to //
translated: Here, the wandering mendicant Maṇi-dhvaja, having aspired to be a follower of faith, entered with limited knowledge.

original: de zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung /
analyzed: de zhugs nas gzugs yongs su ma bzung /
translated: Having entered, he did not grasp form,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dag rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dag rnam par shes pa yongs su ma bzung ngo //
translated: He does not apprehend feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar mtshan ma yid la mi bgyid pa'i slad du des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chos gang yang yongs su ma bzung ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar mtshan ma yid la mi bgyid pa'i slad du des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la chos gang yang yongs su ma bzung ngo //
translated: Because he does not attend to any causal signs, he does not apprehend any dharma at all as empty of its own mark.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar des shes pa de la nang gi thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar des shes pa de la nang gi thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Because he does not see that knowledge as an internal attainment or realization.

original: shes pa de la phyi rol gyi thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa de la phyi rol gyi thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that knowledge as an external attainment or realization.

original: shes pa de la phyi nang gi thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa de la phyi nang gi thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that knowledge as an attainment or realization that is both internal and external.

original: shes pa de la de las gzhan @144b pa'i thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa de la de las gzhan @144b pa'i thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that knowledge as an attainment or realization that is other than those.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /🔽'di ltar des gang zhig shes par bgyid pa'am /🔽gang zhig shes par bgyi ba'am /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na / 'di ltar des gang zhig shes par bgyid pa'am / gang zhig shes par bgyi ba'am /
translated: Why is it so?🔽Because he does not see any dharma that knows,🔽or that which is to be known,

original: gang gis shes par bgyid pa'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: gang gis shes par bgyid pa'i chos de yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: or by which there is knowing.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'di ltar des shes pa de nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //🔽shes pa de nang gi tshor ba'i yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'di ltar des shes pa de nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // shes pa de nang gi tshor ba'i yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: Because he does not see that knowing as being internal form,🔽he does not see that knowing as being internal feeling,

original: shes pa de nang gi 'du shes kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa de nang gi 'du shes kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: he does not see that knowing as being internal perception,

original: shes pa de nang gi 'du byed rnams kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa de nang gi 'du byed rnams kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: he does not see that knowing as being internal volitional formations,

original: shes pa de nang gi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa de nang gi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: he does not see that knowing as being internal consciousness,

original: shes pa de phyi rol gyi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa de phyi rol gyi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: he does not see that knowing as being external form,

original: shes pa de phyi rol gyi tshor ba dang / phyi rol gyi 'du shes dang / phyi rol gyi 'du byed rnams dang / shes pa de phyi rol gyi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa de phyi rol gyi tshor ba dang / phyi rol gyi 'du shes dang / phyi rol gyi 'du byed rnams dang / shes pa de phyi rol gyi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that consciousness is of external feelings, external perceptions, external volitions, or external consciousness.

original: shes pa de phyi nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: shes pa de phyi nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that consciousness is of internal and external form.

original: shes pa de phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi 'du shes dang / phyi nang gi 'du byed rnams dang / shes pa de ni phyi nang gi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa de phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi 'du shes dang / phyi nang gi 'du byed rnams dang / shes pa de ni phyi nang gi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see that consciousness is of internal and external feelings, internal and external perceptions, internal and external volitions, or internal and external consciousness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong /
translated: He does not see that consciousness is other than form, because of the emptiness of internal phenomena.

original: shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness as other than consciousness.

original: gnas kyi rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu phreng ba can mos par gyur te //
analyzed: gnas kyi rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu phreng ba can mos par gyur te //
translated: The wandering mendicant Maṇi-jar-skandha became interested in this enumeration of the stations.

original: de 'di la mos par gyur nas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang nas chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du chos nyid tshad mar bgyis nas /
analyzed: de 'di la mos par gyur nas dad pa'i rjes su 'brang nas chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du chos nyid tshad mar bgyis nas /
translated: Having become interested in it, he, following faith, having taken the Dharma as his authority because of not apprehending any Dharma,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par gyur te /
translated: entered into the knowledge of a knower of all aspects.

original: de de ltar mos par gyur nas mtshan mar yid la mi bgyid pa'i slad du de chos gang yang yongs su ma bzung ngo //🔽chos thams cad gzung du med pa dang / gtang du med pa'i slad du gang zhig blang bar bgyi ba dang / @145a * //
analyzed: de de ltar mos par gyur nas mtshan mar yid la mi bgyid pa'i slad du de chos gang yang yongs su ma bzung ngo // chos thams cad gzung du med pa dang / gtang du med pa'i slad du gang zhig blang bar bgyi ba dang / @145a * //
translated: Having become interested in that way, he did not take up any Dharma because of not taking anything as a sign in mind.

original: dor bar bgyi ba'i chos 'ga' yang des nye bar ma dmigs so //
analyzed: dor bar bgyi ba'i chos 'ga' yang des nye bar ma dmigs so //
translated: Because all dharmas are not taken up and are not given up, he did not apprehend any Dharma that he should take up or give up.

original: chos thams cad gzung du med pa dang / gtang du med pa'i slad du de mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad gzung du med pa dang / gtang du med pa'i slad du de mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid do //
translated: Because all phenomena are ungraspable and unteachable, they do not even falsely project nirvana.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos thams cad la yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mi 'dor ba gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so //🔽bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa gang lags pa dang / tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa gang lags pa dang / 'du shes yongs su mi 'dzin pa gang lags pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad la yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / mi 'dor ba gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so // bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa gang lags pa dang / tshor ba yongs su mi 'dzin pa gang lags pa dang / 'du shes yongs su mi 'dzin pa gang lags pa dang /
translated: The non-apprehension and non-abandonment of all phenomena is the perfection of wisdom.🔽Blessed One, because of the non-apprehension of all phenomena, form is not apprehended, feeling is not apprehended, perception is not apprehended,

original: 'du byed rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa gang lags pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa gang lags pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du /
translated: volitional factors are not apprehended, consciousness is not apprehended, and because all phenomena are not apprehended,

original: so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang /🔽byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang /
analyzed: so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang /
translated: the individual elements, the condensed elements, the sense sources, dependent origination, the establishments of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers,🔽the branches of awakening, the path, the perfections, the noble truths, the meditative concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
translated: the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, the absence of deliberate mental activity, the higher perceptions, the meditative stabilities,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang /🔽chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba nyid kyi slad du smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs pa nas /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba nyid kyi slad du smon lam yongs su ma rdzogs pa nas /
translated: the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, suchness, the true nature, the dharma-constituent,

original: ji srid du de bzhin @145b gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs par /
analyzed: ji srid du de bzhin @145b gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs par /
translated: the establishment of dharmas, the certification of dharmas, and the very limit of reality, and not having taken up the aspiration to complete omniscience, and not having taken up all beings, until they have completed the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba 'di ni /
analyzed: bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba 'di ni /
translated: they do not pass into nirvāṇa in the interval.

original: pha rol ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so //
analyzed: pha rol ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so //
translated: Because of the perfection of the other shore that is not a shore, the perfection of wisdom of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas is so.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: chos thams cad ni chos ma lags te /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni chos ma lags te /
translated: All dharmas are not dharmas,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar ji srid pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar ji srid pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
translated: up to the establishments of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the limbs of awakening, and the eightfold noble path;

original: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar de dag ni chos kyang ma lags /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar de dag ni chos kyang ma lags /
translated: the perfections, the clairvoyances, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not dharmas,

original: chos ma lags pa yang ma lags so //
analyzed: chos ma lags pa yang ma lags so //
translated: It is not a non-phenomenon.

original: bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su ma bzung ba'i slad du'o //
translated: Blessed One, it is because all phenomena are not grasped.🔽Blessed One, this is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings.”

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa 'bring gi dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa 'bring gi dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: This is the distinctive object and aspect of the medium-length section on the peak.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang /
translated: “Furthermore, Blessed One, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,🔽they should investigate thus: ‘What is the perfection of wisdom?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig / ci'i phyir na de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig / ci'i phyir na de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhes de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o //
translated: What is this perfection of wisdom? What is this perfection of wisdom? Why is it called the perfection of wisdom?’”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: gal te 'di ltar ci chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes bya bar nye bar rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar ci chos gang yod pa ma yin zhing mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes bya bar nye bar rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: if they understand things in this way, thinking, ‘Is it the perfection of wisdom that does not exist and is not apprehended?’ they are not practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /🔽tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la @146a * //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la @146a * //
translated: Then venerable Śāriputra🔽said to venerable Subhūti,

original: 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: “Venerable Subhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang rnams med cing mi dmigs pa de dag gang yin /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang rnams med cing mi dmigs pa de dag gang yin /
translated: what are those dharmas that do not exist and are not apprehended?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, they are inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness, the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness, ultimate emptiness,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of the beginningless and endless, the emptiness of nonrepudiation, the emptiness of inherent existence,🔽the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of intrinsic characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
translated: Because of the emptiness of things, the emptiness of nonthings,

original: rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang / gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of essential nature, and the emptiness of other’s nature, the perfection of wisdom does not exist and cannot be found.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the perfection of meditative stability, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of tolerance, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of generosity are non-apprehensible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena, the emptiness of its own mark, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of the essence of non-existence, the emptiness of existence, the emptiness of non-existence,

original: rang gi dngos po stong pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi dngos po stong pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of its own entity, and the emptiness of another’s entity, form is not and is not apprehended.

original: tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Feeling is not and is not apprehended.

original: 'du shes med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du shes med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Perception is not and is not apprehended.

original: @146b 'du byed rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: @146b 'du byed rnams med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Formations are not and are not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, consciousness is not and is not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //🔽phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so // phyi stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, inner emptiness is not and is not apprehended.🔽Outer emptiness is not and is not apprehended.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is not and is not apprehended.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of emptiness does not exist and is not found,

original: chen po stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of great extent does not exist and is not found,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so // 'dus byas stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of ultimate reality does not exist and is not found,🔽the emptiness of conditioned phenomena does not exist and is not found,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena does not exist and is not found,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of the unlimited does not exist and is not found,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //🔽dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end does not exist and is not found,🔽the emptiness of non-dispersal does not exist and is not found,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence does not exist and is not found,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of all things does not exist and is not found,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics does not exist and is not found,

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of non-apprehension does not exist and is not found,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities does not exist and is not found.

original: dngos po stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of things does not exist and is not found,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of nonthings does not exist and is not found,

original: rang gi dngos po stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi dngos po stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness of intrinsic nature does not exist and is not found,

original: gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: and the emptiness of extrinsic nature does not exist and is not found.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du med cing mi dmigs pa nas /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du med cing mi dmigs pa nas /
translated: up to the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening do not exist and are not found,

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: and the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha do not exist and are not found.

original: de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: suchness does not exist and is not found,

original: chos nyid med cing mi dmigs so //🔽chos gnas pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos nyid med cing mi dmigs so // chos gnas pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the true nature of dharmas does not exist and is not found,🔽the dharma-constituent does not exist and is not found,🔽the establishment of dharmas does not exist and is not found,

original: chos nges pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos nges pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the certification of dharmas does not exist and is not found,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: and the very limit of reality does not exist and is not found.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, a buddha is nonexistent and non-apprehensible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, the knowledge of all aspects is nonexistent and non-apprehensible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu @147a * //🔽phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu @147a * // phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe /🔽de'i sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med la /
analyzed: gal te de ltar rtog cing sems pa dang / de ltar rtog cing sems pa'i tshe / de'i sems zhum pa med cing yongs su zhum pa med la /
translated: are investigating and reflecting like this,🔽if their minds do not become cowed, crushed, intimidated, or scared,

original: mi dngang kun tu mi skrag / kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: mi dngang kun tu mi skrag / kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur na /
translated: and if they do not become frightened,🔽then it should be known that bodhisattva great beings are not separated from the practice of the perfection of wisdom.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa chen po'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa chen po'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //
translated: This is the distinctive feature of the object and aspect of the great belonging to the peak.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus /
translated: Then the venerable Śāriputra

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said this to the venerable Subhūti:

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, why should a bodhisattva mahāsattva be known as inseparable from the perfection of wisdom?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra,

original: gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
translated: form is devoid of the nature of form.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are devoid of the nature of consciousness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, the perfection of giving is devoid of the nature of the perfection of giving.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
translated: The perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are divorced from the intrinsic nature of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang /
translated: Similarly, the meditative stabilizations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of magical power, the faculties, the powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / yi ge rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / yi ge rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o //
translated: The factors of awakening, the path, the perfections, the superknowledges, the letters, the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, and the distinct attributes of a buddha are devoid of the intrinsic nature of the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar yang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar yang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, up to the very limit of reality is devoid of the intrinsic nature of the very limit of reality.🔽That is the reality

original: de byang chub sems @147b dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: de byang chub sems @147b dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: that the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: know just as it is.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de'i phyir /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de'i phyir /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o //
translated: therefore you should know that the bodhisattva great beings are not separated from the perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, what is the intrinsic nature of form?

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
translated: What is the intrinsic nature of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness?

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba so so ba dang / bsdus pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
translated: What is the intrinsic nature of the individual and combined components, elements, and dependent originations?

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni ji lta bu /
translated: What is the intrinsic nature up to the very limit of reality?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //🔽tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o // tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, the intrinsic nature of form is non-entity.🔽The intrinsic nature of feeling is non-entity.

original: 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The intrinsic nature of perception is non-entity.

original: 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The intrinsic nature of volitional factors is non-entity.

original: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The intrinsic nature of consciousness is non-entity.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i so so ba dang bsdus pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i so so ba dang bsdus pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The nature of the individual and composite components of the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination is non-entity.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: The nature of the limit of reality is non-entity.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, for this reason

original: khyod kyis 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang /
analyzed: khyod kyis 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang /
translated: you should know that form is devoid of the nature of form, feeling is devoid of the nature of feeling, perception is devoid of the nature of perception, volitional factors are devoid of the nature of volitional factors,

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / skye mched rnams ni skye mched rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / khams rnams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / skye mched rnams ni skye mched rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / khams rnams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba dang /
translated: Dependent origination is free from the nature of dependent origination.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Up to the very limit of reality, one should understand that it is free from the nature of the very limit of reality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, form is free from the characteristic of form.

original: tshor ba ni tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: tshor ba ni tshor ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
translated: Feeling is free from the characteristic of feeling.

original: 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dang bral @148a * //
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dang bral @148a * //
translated: Perception is free from the characteristic of perception.

original: pa'o // 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: pa'o // 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
translated: Formations are free from the characteristic of formations.

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //🔽skye mched rnams ni skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o // skye mched rnams ni skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
translated: Consciousness is free from the characteristic of consciousness.🔽The sense sources are free from the characteristic of the sense sources.

original: khams rnams ni khams rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: khams rnams ni khams rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
translated: The constituents are free from the characteristic of the constituents.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bar ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bar ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
translated: Up to dependent origination is free from the characteristic of dependent origination.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
translated: Up to the very limit of reality is free from the characteristic of the very limit of reality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo dang bral ba'o //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, characteristics are free from the nature of characteristics.

original: ngo bo yang ngo bo'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: ngo bo yang ngo bo'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o //
translated: Nature is free from the characteristic of nature.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said:

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig bslab pa 'di la slob pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, will those bodhisattva great beings who train in this training go forth to the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de de bzhin te /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de de bzhin te / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, it is so!🔽Those bodhisattva great beings who train in this training will go forth to the knowledge of all aspects.”

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bzod pa chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bzod pa chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //
translated: This is the distinctive object and aspect of the small acceptance.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma skyes shing nges par ma byung ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma skyes shing nges par ma byung ba'o //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, it is because all phenomena are non-arisen and do not come forth.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyu gang gis na chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par ma 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyu gang gis na chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par ma 'byung ba yin /
translated: Śāriputra said, “Venerable Subhūti, by what cause are all phenomena non-arisen and do not come forth?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, form is empty of the intrinsic nature of form.

original: de la skye ba'am /
analyzed: de la skye ba'am /
translated: In it, arising and

original: nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so //
translated: cessation are not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, feeling is empty of the intrinsic nature of feeling.

original: de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so //
translated: In it, arising and cessation are not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, perception is empty of the intrinsic nature of perception.

original: de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so //
translated: In it, arising and cessation are not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, volitional factors are empty of the intrinsic nature of volitional factors.

original: de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so //
translated: In them, arising and cessation are not apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, consciousness is empty of the intrinsic nature of consciousness.

original: de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs @148b so //
analyzed: de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs @148b so //
translated: nor is the arising or the definite emergence of that apprehended.

original: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste /
translated: Similarly, the aggregates, the constituents, the sense fields, dependent origination, up to the very limit of reality are empty of the intrinsic nature of the very limit of reality.

original: de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de la skye ba'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so //
translated: nor is the arising or the definite emergence of that apprehended.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom like that

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te /
translated: are close to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: As they get closer and closer to the knowledge of all aspects, they will attain a purified body, a purified speech, a purified mind, and purified marks.

original: de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do //
analyzed: de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do //
translated: The more a bodhisattva-mahāsattva attains a pure body, a pure speech, a pure mind, and pure marks, the more that bodhisattva-mahāsattva does not give rise to a mind endowed with desire.

original: zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do //
analyzed: zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do //
translated: He does not give rise to a mind endowed with anger.

original: gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do //
analyzed: gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do //
translated: He does not give rise to a mind endowed with delusion.

original: nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do //
analyzed: nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do //
translated: He does not give rise to a mind endowed with pride.

original: g-yo dang sgyu dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do //
analyzed: g-yo dang sgyu dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / sred pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do //
translated: He does not give rise to a mind endowed with deceit and pretense, envy and stinginess, craving and bad views.

original: de 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing /
analyzed: de 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing /
translated: He does not give rise to a mind endowed with desire.

original: zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / g-yo dang / sgyu dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sred pa dang / lta ba ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed pas nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / g-yo dang / sgyu dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / sred pa dang / lta ba ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed pas nam yang ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: He never again enters the womb, because he does not arouse a mind that is full of hatred, delusion, pride, deceit, hypocrisy, envy, stinginess, craving, or bad views.

original: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He is always and continuously spontaneously born.

original: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He never again takes rebirth in the lower realms, except as a means of ripening beings.

original: de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
analyzed: de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
translated: He goes from buddhafield to buddhafield.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed /
translated: He serves the lord buddhas.

original: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed /
translated: He ripens beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang spyod par byed de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams @149a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang spyod par byed de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams @149a * //
translated: They will experience the buddhafields and then, until they fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood, they will never be separated from the blessed buddhas.

original: dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and he will not be separated from the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, until he has fully known the utmost, right, and perfect enlightenment.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni /
translated: “The bodhisattva great being who practices the perfection of wisdom like this, venerable Śāriputra,🔽approaches omniscience.”

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bzod pa 'bring gi dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bzod pa 'bring gi dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //
translated: This is the distinctive object and aspect of middling patience.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te //
translated: Then venerable Subhūti said to the Lord:

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Lord, if bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de /
analyzed: thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de /
translated: If one practices with regard to form without skill in means, one practices with signs.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: One does not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te tshor ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
analyzed: gal te tshor ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
translated: If one practices with regard to feeling, one practices with signs.

original: 'du shes la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
analyzed: 'du shes la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
translated: If one practices with regard to perception, one practices with signs.

original: 'du byed rnams la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
translated: If one practices with regard to volitional factors, one practices with signs.

original: rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
translated: If one practices with regard to consciousness, one practices with signs.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽gal te gzugs rtag pa'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // gal te gzugs rtag pa'am /
translated: One does not practice the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one practices with regard to form as permanent

original: mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de /
analyzed: mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de /
translated: or impermanent, one practices with signs.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽gal te tshor ba rtag pa'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // gal te tshor ba rtag pa'am /
translated: One does not practice the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one practices with regard to feeling as permanent

original: mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //🔽'du shes rtag pa'am /
analyzed: mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do // 'du shes rtag pa'am /
translated: or impermanent, one practices with signs.🔽If one practices with regard to perception as permanent

original: mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
analyzed: mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
translated: or impermanent, one practices with signs.🔽If one practices with regard to volitional factors as permanent

original: 'du byed rnams rtag pa'am /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams rtag pa'am /
translated: or impermanent, one practices with signs.
