original: mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //🔽rnam par shes pa rtag pa'am /
analyzed: mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do // rnam par shes pa rtag pa'am /
translated: If one practices saying, ‘Impermanent,’ one is practicing with a sign.🔽If one practices saying, ‘Consciousness is permanent’

original: mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
analyzed: mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
translated: or ‘Consciousness is impermanent,’ one is practicing with a sign.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽gal te gzugs bde ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // gal te gzugs bde ba'am /
translated: One is not practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one practices saying, ‘Form is happiness’

original: sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
translated: or ‘Form is suffering,’ one is practicing with a sign.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽gal te tshor ba bde ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // gal te tshor ba bde ba'am /
translated: One is not practicing the perfection of wisdom.🔽If one practices saying, ‘Feeling is happiness’

original: sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //🔽'du shes bde ba'am /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do // 'du shes bde ba'am /
translated: or ‘Feeling is suffering,’ one is practicing with a sign.🔽If one practices saying, ‘Perception is happiness’

original: sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
translated: or ‘Perception is suffering,’ one is practicing with a sign.

original: 'du byed rnams bde ba'am /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams bde ba'am /
translated: If one practices saying, ‘Disposition is happiness’

original: sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //🔽rnam par shes pa bde ba'am /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do // rnam par shes pa bde ba'am /
translated: or ‘Disposition is suffering,’ one is practicing with a sign.🔽If one practices saying, ‘Consciousness is happiness’

original: sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
translated: or ‘Consciousness is suffering,’ one is practicing with a sign.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽gal te gzugs bdag gam /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // gal te gzugs bdag gam /
translated: they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.🔽If they practice ‘form is a self’

original: bdag med ces bgyi bar @149b spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de /
analyzed: bdag med ces bgyi bar @149b spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de /
translated: or ‘form is not a self,’ they practice a causal sign.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshor ba bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
analyzed: tshor ba bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
translated: If they practice ‘feeling is a self’ or ‘feeling is not a self,’ they practice a causal sign.

original: 'du shes bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
analyzed: 'du shes bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
translated: If they practice ‘perception is a self’ or ‘perception is not a self,’ they practice a causal sign.

original: 'du byed rnams bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
translated: If they practice ‘volitional factors are a self’ or ‘volitional factors are not a self,’ they practice a causal sign.

original: rnam par shes pa bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de /
translated: If they practice ‘consciousness is a self’ or ‘consciousness is not a self,’ they practice a causal sign.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽gal te gzugs zhi ba'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // gal te gzugs zhi ba'am /
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom.🔽If they practice ‘form is calm’

original: ma zhi ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de /
analyzed: ma zhi ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de /
translated: or ‘form is not calm,’ they practice a causal sign.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshor ba zhi pa'am /
analyzed: tshor ba zhi pa'am /
translated: If they practice ‘feeling is calm’🔽or ‘feeling is not calm,’ they practice a causal sign.

original: ma zhi ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //🔽'du shes zhi ba'am /
analyzed: ma zhi ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do // 'du shes zhi ba'am /
translated: If one practices, saying, ‘It is not peace,’ one is practicing with signs.

original: ma zhi ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //🔽'du byed rnams zhi ba'am /
analyzed: ma zhi ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do // 'du byed rnams zhi ba'am /
translated: If one practices, saying, ‘Feeling is peace’ or ‘It is not peace,’ one is practicing with signs.🔽If one practices, saying, ‘Perception is peace’ or ‘It is not peace,’ one is practicing with signs.

original: ma zhi ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //🔽rnam par shes pa zhi ba'am /
analyzed: ma zhi ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do // rnam par shes pa zhi ba'am /
translated: If one practices, saying, ‘Formations are peace’ or ‘They are not peace,’ one is practicing with signs.

original: ma zhi ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
analyzed: ma zhi ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
translated: If one practices, saying, ‘Consciousness is peace’ or ‘It is not peace,’ one is practicing with signs.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽gal te gzugs dben pa'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // gal te gzugs dben pa'am /
translated: One does not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
analyzed: mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
translated: If one practices, saying, ‘Form is isolated’ or ‘It is not isolated,’ one is practicing with signs.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽tshor ba dben pa'am /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // tshor ba dben pa'am /
translated: One does not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //🔽'du shes dben pa'am /🔽mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
analyzed: mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do // 'du shes dben pa'am / mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
translated: If one practices, saying, ‘Feeling is isolated’ or ‘It is not isolated,’ one is practicing with signs.🔽If one practices, saying, ‘Perception is isolated’ or ‘It is not isolated,’ one is practicing with signs.

original: 'du byed rnams dben pa'am /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams dben pa'am /
translated: If one practices, saying, ‘Formations are isolated’ or ‘They are not isolated,’ one is practicing with signs.

original: mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
analyzed: mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do //
translated: If one practices what is called “non-solitude,” one practices signs.🔽

original: rnam par shes pa dben pa'am mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dben pa'am mi dben pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de /
translated: If they practice with the idea that consciousness is isolated or not isolated, they are practicing with signs.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They are not practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Blessed One, if bodhisattva great beings, when they practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
analyzed: thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /
translated: practice up to the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening without skill in means, they are practicing with signs.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They are not practicing the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mig lnga rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i @150a * //
translated: Similarly, if they practice the clairvoyances, perfections, concentrations, immeasurables, formless absorptions, five eyes, and the ten tathāgata powers,

original: stobs bcu rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar rnams la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do /

translated: If they practice the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, they are practicing a sign.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: They are not practicing the perfection of wisdom.

translated: and to the knowledge of all aspects, then, because of abiding in the dharmas of the buddhas, having superior aspiration, and having complete understanding, they practice the formative predispositions of the dharmas of the buddhas.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pas skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba las yongs su mi 'grol bas sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pas skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba las yongs su mi 'grol bas sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do //
translated: Because they practice the formative predispositions, they are said not to be liberated from great suffering, because they are not liberated from birth, old age, disease, death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, and unhappiness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, that bodhisattva great being does not even have the good fortune to actualize the śrāvaka level or

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang mngon du bya ba'i skal ba yang med na /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang mngon du bya ba'i skal ba yang med na /
translated: the pratyekabuddha level,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba lta ci smos te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba lta ci smos te /
translated: let alone to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ni gnas med do //
analyzed: de ni gnas med do //
translated: That is not possible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom like that,

original: thabs mi mkhas par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: thabs mi mkhas par shes par bya'o //
translated: they should be known as unskilled.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu @151b phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na thabs mkhas par shes par bya /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu @151b phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na thabs mkhas par shes par bya /
translated: Śāriputra said, “Venerable Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, how should they be known as skilled?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they should be known as skilled in the perfection of wisdom if, when they practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not practice form, do not practice the production of form, and do not practice the nonproduction of form.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs la gnas pa med pa dang / lhag par mos pa med pa dang / kun shes pa med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa med pa dang / lhag par mos pa med pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs la gnas pa med pa dang / lhag par mos pa med pa dang / kun shes pa med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas pa med pa dang / lhag par mos pa med pa dang /
translated: they do not dwell on form, do not have superior motivation toward it, and do not understand it; they do not dwell on feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness, do not have superior motivation toward it, and do not understand it.

original: kun shes pa med pa dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la gnas pa med pa dang / lhag par mos pa med pa dang / kun shes pa med pas de gzugs la mi spyod /
analyzed: kun shes pa med pa dang / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la gnas pa med pa dang / lhag par mos pa med pa dang / kun shes pa med pas de gzugs la mi spyod /
translated: Similarly, they do not dwell on , up to and including the buddhadharmas, do not have superior motivation toward them, and do not understand them. Therefore, they do not engage with form,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod de /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod de /
translated: do not engage with feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness,

original: gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod /
translated: and do not engage with the causal signs of form,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the characteristics of feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness.

original: gzugs rtag pa'am /🔽mi rtag pa zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: gzugs rtag pa'am / mi rtag pa zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that form is permanent or impermanent.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa'am /🔽mi rtag pa zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽gzugs bde ba'am /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa'am / mi rtag pa zhes bya bar mi spyod / gzugs bde ba'am /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness is permanent or impermanent.🔽They do not engage with the notion that form is imbued with happiness or suffering,🔽that it is a self or not a self,🔽that it is empty or not empty,

original: sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba dang / bdag yod pa'am /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba dang / bdag yod pa'am /
translated: that it is with signs or signless,🔽that it is having aspirations or lacking aspirations,🔽that it is calm or not calm,

original: bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang / zhi ba'am /🔽ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la yang de bzhin te /🔽rnam par shes pa bde ba'am /
analyzed: bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang / zhi ba'am / ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la yang de bzhin te / rnam par shes pa bde ba'am /
translated: or that it is void or not void.🔽They do not engage with the notion that feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness is imbued with happiness or suffering,

original: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag gam bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang / zhi ba'am ma zhi ba zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag gam bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang / zhi ba'am ma zhi ba zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: that it is a self or not a self,🔽that it is empty or not empty,

original: gzugs stong pa'am /
analyzed: gzugs stong pa'am /
translated: that it is with signs or signless,🔽that it is having aspirations or lacking aspirations,🔽that it is calm or not calm,🔽or that it is void or not void.🔽They do not engage with the notion that form is with afflictions or free from afflictions,🔽that it is arising or ceasing,🔽or that it is afflicted or purified.🔽They do not engage with the notion that feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness is with afflictions or free from afflictions,🔽that it is arising or ceasing,🔽or that it is afflicted or purified.🔽They do not engage with the notion that form is past, future, or present,🔽or that it is to be adopted or discarded.🔽They do not engage with the notion that feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness is past, future, or present,🔽or that it is to be adopted or discarded.

original: mi stong pa zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: mi stong pa zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: They do not engage with the notion that form is excellent or not excellent,🔽or that it is surpassable or unsurpassable.🔽They do not engage with the notion that feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness is excellent or not excellent,

original: mtshan ma yod pa'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma yod pa'am /
translated: or that it is surpassable or unsurpassable.🔽They do not engage with the notion that form is endowed with virtue or nonvirtue,🔽or that it is mundane or supramundane.🔽They do not engage with the notion that feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness is endowed with virtue or nonvirtue,🔽or that it is mundane or supramundane.🔽They do not engage with the notion that form is compounded or uncompounded,🔽or

original: mtshan ma med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽smon pa yod pa'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod / smon pa yod pa'am /
translated: they do not engage with ‘signless,’🔽they do not engage with ‘with wishes’ or

original: smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: ‘wish less,’

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la de bzhin te /🔽rnam par shes pa stong pa'am /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la de bzhin te / rnam par shes pa stong pa'am /
translated: and the same goes for feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions,🔽and consciousness.🔽They do not engage with ‘empty’ or

original: mi stong pa zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽mtshan ma yod pa'am /
analyzed: mi stong pa zhes bya bar mi spyod / mtshan ma yod pa'am /
translated: ‘not empty,’🔽they do not engage with ‘with signs’ or

original: mtshan ma med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod /🔽smon pa yod pa'am /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod / smon pa yod pa'am /
translated: ‘signless,’🔽they do not engage with ‘with wishes’ or

original: smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod /
analyzed: smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod /
translated: ‘wish less,’🔽and they do not engage with ‘isolated’ or

original: dben pa'am / mi dben pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
analyzed: dben pa'am / mi dben pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na /
translated: ‘not isolated.’

original: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o //
translated: At that time, it should be known that the bodhisattva great beings are skilled in means.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i @152a * //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i @152a * //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,

original: bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gzhan na gzugs med /
analyzed: bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin / stong pa nyid las gzhan na gzugs med /
translated: it is because the emptiness of form is not form.🔽Form is not other than emptiness.

original: gzugs las gzhan na stong pa nyid med de /
analyzed: gzugs las gzhan na stong pa nyid med de /
translated: Emptiness is not other than form.

original: gzugs nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Form itself is empty.

original: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so //
translated: Emptiness itself is form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin /
translated: The emptiness of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is not feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness.

original: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang /🔽rnam par shes pa med /🔽rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang / rnam par shes pa med / rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yang /
translated: Consciousness is not elsewhere than emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa /
analyzed: stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa /
translated: Emptiness is not elsewhere than consciousness.🔽Consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness itself is consciousness.

original: de bzhin du skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang /
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of the sense fields, elements, dependent origination, thirty-seven factors of awakening, perfections, concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions is not the sense fields, elements, dependent origination, thirty-seven factors of awakening, perfections, concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin /🔽stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin / stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med /
translated: The emptiness of the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, up to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is not the distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽The distinct attributes of a buddha are not other than emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gzhan na yang stong pa nyid med de /🔽stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gzhan na yang stong pa nyid med de / stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams /
translated: Emptiness is not other than the distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽The distinct attributes of a buddha are emptiness.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom like that should be known as skilled in means.”🔽“Subhūti, what is the skill in means of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom?”

original: // / bam po bcu gcig pa /🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: // / bam po bcu gcig pa / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Chapter 11🔽The Lord: So it is, Shariputra, so it is.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do//
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod do//
translated: A Bodhisattva, a great being who thus courses in the perfection of wisdom, has the chance to fully know the supreme enlightenment.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: When he courses in the perfection of wisdom,

original: gal te chos 'ga' zhig nye bar rtogs na /
analyzed: gal te chos 'ga' zhig nye bar rtogs na /
translated: if he apprehends any dharma,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //🔽nye bar ma rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do // nye bar ma rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: he does not course in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If he does not apprehend any dharma, he does not course in the perfection of wisdom.

original: nye bar rtogs pa yang ma yin la /🔽nye bar ma rtogs pa yang yin na /🔽shes rab kyi @152b pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: nye bar rtogs pa yang ma yin la / nye bar ma rtogs pa yang yin na / shes rab kyi @152b pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: If he does not apprehend any dharma, he does not course in the perfection of wisdom.🔽If he does not apprehend any dharma, he does not course in the perfection of wisdom.

original: nye bar rtogs pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: nye bar rtogs pa yang ma yin la /
translated: If he does not apprehend any dharma, he does not course in the perfection of wisdom.

original: nye bar ma rtogs pa yang ma yin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: nye bar ma rtogs pa yang ma yin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do //
translated: If they neither realize nor do not realize, they do not practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, why is it that

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽nye bar rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin /🔽nye bar ma rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / nye bar rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin / nye bar ma rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom🔽they do not practice the perfection of wisdom if they realize,

original: nye bar rtogs pa yang ma yin la /🔽nye bar ma rtogs pa yang yin na /
analyzed: nye bar rtogs pa yang ma yin la / nye bar ma rtogs pa yang yin na /
translated: and they do not practice the perfection of wisdom if they do not realize,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin /🔽nye bar rtogs pa yang ma yin la nye bar ma rtogs pa yang ma yin na /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin / nye bar rtogs pa yang ma yin la nye bar ma rtogs pa yang ma yin na /
translated: and they do not practice the perfection of wisdom if they both realize and do not realize,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin /
translated: and they do not practice the perfection of wisdom if they neither realize nor do not realize?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,🔽“Śāriputra,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, it is because the perfection of wisdom is not apprehended as a real thing.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: Because the perfection of wisdom is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, for this reason

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe spyod do zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe spyod do zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so //
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom they do not apprehend ‘I am practicing,’

original: mi spyod do zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so //🔽spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so //
analyzed: mi spyod do zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so // spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so //
translated: they do not apprehend ‘I am not practicing,’🔽they do not apprehend ‘I am practicing and also not practicing,’

original: spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin na zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so //
analyzed: spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin na zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so //
translated: and they do not apprehend ‘I am neither practicing nor not practicing.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma spangs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud cing ma spangs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because they have understood and not abandoned all phenomena as having the nature of non-entityness.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum zhing kun tu mi zhum ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum zhing kun tu mi zhum ste /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom in that way do not become disheartened, do not become timid,

original: mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pas zin par ma gyur na /
analyzed: mi dngang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pas zin par ma gyur na /
translated: do not become frightened, do not become terrified, and do not become overwhelmed by terror,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzod pa chen po'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzod pa chen po'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro //
translated: it should be known that those bodhisattva great beings are close to the knowledge of all aspects.” This is the distinctive object and aspect of great patience.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa'o //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, that knowledge of all aspects, because it has the nature of non-entityness, is non-dual and cannot be made dual.

original: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge @153a * //
analyzed: de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge @153a * //
translated: That is the bodhisattva great beings’ meditative stabilization

original: 'dzin ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba de /
analyzed: 'dzin ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba de /
translated: called ‘non-arising of all phenomena.’🔽It is vast,

original: yangs pa / mdun du byas pa /🔽tshad med par nges pa /
analyzed: yangs pa / mdun du byas pa / tshad med par nges pa /
translated: made manifest,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa'o //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa'o //
translated: unassailable by śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: sh'a ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: Śāriputra, the bodhisattva great beings who practice with that meditative stabilization quickly and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.”

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin ni gang dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin ni gang dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, what are the meditative stabilizations by which bodhisattva great beings standing in them quickly and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,🔽“Śāriputra, there is the meditative stabilization called ‘the seal of the Dharma.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, there is a samādhi called the revealed equality of the nature of all phenomena, by remaining in which bodhisattva great beings quickly and fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.”🔽

original: chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod do //
analyzed: chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod do //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, there is a samādhi called the hero’s progress, which bodhisattva mahāsattvas should develop.

original: de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: “There is a samādhi called the precious seal.

original: seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //🔽zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do // zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a samādhi called the lion’s sport.🔽There is a samādhi called the good moon.

original: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan rtog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan rtog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a samādhi called the banner of the moon.

original: chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a samādhi called the supreme among all Dharmas.

original: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called seal of all phenomena.

original: spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //🔽chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do // chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called looking at the crown of the head.🔽There is an absorption called ascertainment of the realm of phenomena.

original: nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called banner of ascertainment.

original: rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called vajra-like.

original: chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called seal of engagement with all phenomena.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs su rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs su rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called abiding in the state of equipoise.

original: rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called royal seal.

original: stobs kyi brtson 'grus zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: stobs kyi brtson 'grus zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called strength and diligence.

original: chos thams cad las yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad las yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called rising above all phenomena.

original: ting nge 'dzin la @153b rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la @153b rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a meditative absorption called “abiding like a king in meditative absorption.”

original: 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a meditative absorption called “emitting light rays.”

original: dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a meditative absorption called “arrayed army.”

original: yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a meditative absorption called “noble.”

original: nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a meditative absorption called “unfailing engagement with etymologies.”

original: lta bas chog mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: lta bas chog mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a meditative absorption called “never satisfied with seeing.”

original: tshig bla dags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: tshig bla dags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a meditative absorption called “correct engagement with the ultimate.”

original: phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a meditative absorption called “viewing the directions.”

original: phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a meditative absorption called “holding the seal.”

original: nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is a meditative absorption called “unfailing.”

original: chos thams ca yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: chos thams ca yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called seal of the ocean of the perfect gathering of all phenomena.

original: nam mkha' ltar rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //🔽rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //🔽rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do // rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called filling the sky.🔽There is an absorption called vajra maṇḍala.🔽There is an absorption called victory banner’s crest jewel.

original: dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called sense-organ banner.

original: rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //🔽seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do // seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called following the stream.🔽There is an absorption called lion’s yawn.

original: snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called diagonal.

original: nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called abandoning afflictions.

original: rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called shining.

original: tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called “No-seeking”.

original: gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called “No-support-for-abiding”.

original: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//🔽dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called “No-mind”.🔽There is the meditative stabilization called “Stainless Lamp”.

original: 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called “Infinite Light”.

original: 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called “Light-maker”.

original: kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called “Universal Illumination”.

original: dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called “Highest Purity”.

original: 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called “Stainless Light”.

original: dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called “Maker of Joy”.

original: rgyal bar bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rgyal bar bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called “Unconquerable”.

original: glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called “Lightning Lamp”.

original: zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called Inexhaustible.

original: mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge @154a * //🔽'dzin yod do //
analyzed: mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge @154a * // 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called Unconquerable.

original: gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //🔽zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do // zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called Having Brilliance.🔽There is the meditative stabilization called Free from Exhaustion.

original: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called Unmoving.

original: rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called Distinctive.

original: 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: 'jigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called Fearless.

original: nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called Sun Lamp.

original: zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do /
analyzed: zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do /
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called Stainless Moon.

original: shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //🔽snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do // snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called Lamp of Wisdom.🔽There is the meditative stabilization called Clear Light.

original: snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is the meditative stabilization called Making Light.

original: bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is the samadhi called performing activities.

original: ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is the samadhi called the banner of wisdom.

original: rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is the samadhi called vajra-like.

original: sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is the samadhi called mind-dwelling.

original: kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is the samadhi called universal illumination.

original: rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is the samadhi called well-established.

original: rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is the samadhi called precious end.

original: chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is the samadhi called the seal of the sublime Dharma.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is the samadhi called the equality of all dharmas.

original: dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is the samadhi called abandoning joy.

original: chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is the samadhi called exalted by Dharma.

original: rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: there is the samadhi called scattering.

original: chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called revealing the words of all phenomena.

original: yi ge rnam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: yi ge rnam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called arranging the letters.

original: yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called free from letters.

original: dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //🔽'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do // 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called cutting off the object.🔽There is an absorption called unchanging.

original: rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called without aspects.

original: ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called engaging with names.

original: gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called conduct without a basis.

original: rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called without cataracts.

original: spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called endowed with conduct.

original: g-yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: g-yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called unmoving.

original: g-yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: g-yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called crossing the battlefield.

original: yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called source of all good qualities.

original: sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called dwelling in the absence of mind.

original: dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
analyzed: dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
translated: There is an absorption called blooming and shining of virtuous flowers.

original: @154b byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: @154b byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called possessing the branches of awakening.

original: spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called infinite eloquence.

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called equal to the unequaled.

original: chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //🔽yongs su gcod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do // yongs su gcod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called transcending all phenomena.🔽There is an absorption called making complete.

original: nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called dispelling doubt.

original: gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called no activity as a site.

original: gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called single array.

original: rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called accomplishment of aspects.

original: rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
analyzed: rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
translated: There is an absorption called single aspect.

original: rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called no discarded aspects.

original: srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //🔽brda dang / sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do // brda dang / sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called understanding the basis of all existence.🔽There is an absorption called engaging with words and sounds.

original: sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called endowed with melodious sounds.

original: yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called free from syllables.

original: sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called blazing light.

original: mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called “purifying characteristics.”

original: mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called “non-apprehending.”

original: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called “endowed with the highest of all aspects.”

original: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called “not delighting in any suffering or happiness.”

original: zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called “inexhaustible casket.”

original: gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called “dhāraṇī intelligence.”

original: 'jig rten thams cad rab tu sgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad rab tu sgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called “contemplating all worlds.”

original: ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called “absorption equality.”

original: tshul dang tshul med pa las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: tshul dang tshul med pa las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called “liberated from rules and non-rules.”

original: rjes su 'brang ba thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: rjes su 'brang ba thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called gathering all followers.

original: gzhi med par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: gzhi med par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called ascertainment of groundlessness.

original: de bzhin nyid la gnas par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //🔽lus kyi skyon yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gnas par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do // lus kyi skyon yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called ascertainment of abiding in suchness.🔽There is an absorption called destroying the faults of the body.

original: ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called destroying the faults of speech.

original: nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called like space.

original: nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do //
translated: There is an absorption called liberated and unstained by the absence of attachment like space.

original: @155a * // ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
analyzed: @155a * // ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice with those samādhis will quickly attain the highest, complete enlightenment.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, those are the bodhisattva mahāsattvas’ samādhis.

original: ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattvas who practice with those samādhis will quickly attain the highest, complete enlightenment.”

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas /
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang la bslabs pas /
translated: “In that way, having trained in the dhāraṇī gateway,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod de /
translated: There are also other countless, immeasurable suchnesses that enable bodhisattva great beings to quickly and fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the heroic progress meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul nyams su myong bar 'gyur pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul nyams su myong bar 'gyur pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization by means of which one experiences the domain of all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called the heroic progress meditative stabilization.

original: de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the precious seal meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas gdab par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas gdab par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization by means of which one seals all meditative stabilizations.

original: de ni rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called the precious seal meditative stabilization.

original: de bzhin du de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: Similarly, what is the concentration called “liberation without attachment, like space”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med cing rnam par grol bas gos pa med pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med cing rnam par grol bas gos pa med pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: It is the concentration standing in which he attains the liberation without attachment, like space, of all dharmas, being liberated from them without grasping.🔽This is the concentration called “liberation without attachment, like space.”

original: de ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //🔽de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: de ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no // de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: This is the distinctive object and aspect of the weak supreme mundane quality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then, through the Buddha’s power, the venerable Subhūti said to the venerable Śāriputra:🔽“Venerable Śāriputra, the perfection of wisdom should be inquired into in the venerable Śāriputra.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gi gnas pa ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gi gnas pa ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, the bodhisattva great beings who abide in those meditative stabilities have been prophesied by the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas of the past to awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //🔽da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to // da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gangg'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas of the past have prophesied the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment of bodhisattva great beings who have remained in those meditative stabilities.

original: @155b de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba gang dag yin pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung bstan te /
analyzed: @155b de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba gang dag yin pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung bstan te /
translated: The tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas who are now present, alive, and present in the world systems of the ten directions, as numerous as the sand grains in the Ganges River, have also prophesied the unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment of those bodhisattva great beings.

original: des ni ting nge 'dzin yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
analyzed: des ni ting nge 'dzin yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /
translated: They do not see even a meditative stability.

original: bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do //
analyzed: bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do //
translated: He does not think, “I am entering into samādhi,” and that samādhi does not make him feel proud.🔽He does not see samādhi.

original: des ni ting nge 'dzin yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: des ni ting nge 'dzin yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not think, “I am entering into samādhi,”

original: bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go //🔽bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go // bdag gis mnyam par gzhag par bya'o //
translated: “I am resting in samādhi,”🔽or “I have rested in samādhi.”

original: bdag ni mnyam par gzhag par gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de /
analyzed: bdag ni mnyam par gzhag par gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de /
translated: He does not think in those terms.🔽Those thoughts do not occur to him.”

original: de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med cing mi rgyu'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog 'bring gi dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //
analyzed: de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med cing mi rgyu'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog 'bring gi dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no //
translated: This is the difference in the object and aspect of the middling supreme mundane quality.

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /🔽tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, do the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas prophesy the bodhisattva great beings who are in this samādhi?🔽”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,🔽“Śāriputra, the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly enlightened buddhas prophesy the bodhisattva great beings who are in this samādhi.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ni med de /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ni med de /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, it is not so.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it not so?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin yang gzhan /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin yang gzhan /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, it is because there is no other perfection of wisdom than that, and there is no other meditative stabilization than that,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi /
translated: and there is no other bodhisattva than that.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin te /🔽ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin te / ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: The perfection of wisdom itself is the meditative stabilization,🔽and the meditative stabilization itself is the bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin te //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin te //
translated: The bodhisattva itself is the meditative stabilization.

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la /🔽byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med /
translated: ” “Venerable Subhūti, if it is so that there is no other meditative stabilization than that,🔽and there is no other bodhisattva than that,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la /
translated: and there is no other bodhisattva than that,

original: ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de /
translated: and there is no other meditative stabilization than that,

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na /
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na /
translated: Because all phenomena are the same, meditative absorption is a bodhisattva, and a bodhisattva is meditative absorption.

original: de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam /
analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam /
translated: So, is it possible to teach meditative absorption here?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ni ma yin no //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, it is not.”🔽Śāriputra asked,

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam /
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su byed dam /
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, does that noble son conceptualize that meditative absorption?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, there is no conceptualization.”🔽Śāriputra asked,

original: smras pa / ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: smras pa / ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur /
translated: “How could there be no conceptualization?”

original: rab 'byor gyis @156a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis @156a * //
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: smras pa / ji ltar rnam par rtog pa med pa ltar ro //
analyzed: smras pa / ji ltar rnam par rtog pa med pa ltar ro //
translated: “Just as there is no conceptualization, so it is.”🔽Śāriputra asked,

original: smras pa de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin /
analyzed: smras pa de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin /
translated: “How is there no conceptualization?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtag pa med de /
analyzed: chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtag pa med de /
translated: “Because all phenomena are nonexistent, there is no permanence.

original: de ltar na ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med do //
analyzed: de ltar na ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med do //
translated: Thus, that meditative stabilization is non-conceptual.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu rnam grangs des na /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, for this reason

original: rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do //
translated: that son of a good family does not cognize that meditative stabilization.

original: 'du shes su byed pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes su byed pa med do //
translated: He does not conceptualize it.

original: smras pa / ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med cing /
analyzed: smras pa / ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med cing /
translated: He said, “Why does he not cognize it?

original: 'du shes su 'gyur ba med /
analyzed: 'du shes su 'gyur ba med /
translated: Why does he not conceptualize it?”

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: ting nge 'dzin de yang med la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir /
