original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /🔽bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags /
translated: Subhūti replied, “No, Blessed One.

original: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: The earth element is not one thing and illusion another.🔽The earth element itself is illusion;

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so //
translated: illusion itself is the earth element.”

original: bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the water element is not one thing,

original: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: and an illusion another.🔽The water element itself is an illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so //
translated: An illusion itself is the water element.

original: bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the fire element is not one thing,

original: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: and an illusion another.🔽The fire element itself is an illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang me'i khams so //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang me'i khams so //
translated: An illusion itself is the fire element.

original: bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the wind element is not one thing,

original: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: and an illusion another.🔽The wind element itself is an illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //
translated: An illusion itself is the wind element.

original: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the space element is not one thing,

original: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: and an illusion another.🔽The space element itself is an illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so /
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so /
translated: An illusion itself is the space element.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags /
translated: Blessed One, the consciousness element is not one thing,🔽and an illusion another.

original: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /
analyzed: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /
translated: “Illusion” is not one thing,🔽and the consciousness element another.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: The consciousness element itself is illusion;🔽illusion itself is the consciousness element.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gsum pa khams su btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gsum pa khams su btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: This is the third concept in regard to the elements, the concept of the elements as illusion.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “What do you think, Subhūti?

original: sgyu ma yang gzhan la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
analyzed: sgyu ma yang gzhan la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
translated: Is illusion one thing and dependent origination another?🔽”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /🔽bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags /
translated: Subhūti replied,🔽“No, Lord.

original: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: Ignorance is not one thing and illusion another.🔽Ignorance itself is illusion;

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //
translated: illusion itself is ignorance.

original: bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: Lord, volitional actions are not one thing and illusion another.🔽Volitional actions themselves are illusion;

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do //
translated: illusion itself is volitional actions.

original: bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la /
translated: Bhagavān, consciousness is one thing,🔽

original: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽rnam par shes pa @162a * //🔽nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / rnam par shes pa @162a * // nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: Blessed One, consciousness is not one thing and illusion another.🔽Consciousness itself is illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Illusion itself is consciousness.

original: bcom ldan 'das ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: Blessed One, name and form are not one thing and illusion another.🔽Name and form themselves are illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //
translated: Illusion itself is name and form.

original: bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / skye mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: Blessed One, the six sense sources are not one thing and illusion another.🔽The six sense sources themselves are illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go //
translated: Illusion itself is the six sense sources.

original: bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: Blessed One, contact is not one thing and illusion another.🔽Contact itself is illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o //
translated: Illusion itself is contact.

original: bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /
translated: Blessed One, feeling is not one thing and illusion another.

original: tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: Feeling itself is illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
translated: Illusion itself is feeling.

original: bcom ldan 'das sred pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sred pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: Blessed One, craving is not one thing, and illusion another.🔽Craving itself is illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o //
translated: Illusion itself is craving.

original: bcom ldan 'das len pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽len pa nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das len pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / len pa nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: Blessed One, grasping is not one thing, and illusion another.🔽Grasping itself is illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o //
translated: Illusion itself is grasping.

original: bcom ldan 'das srid pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das srid pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: Blessed One, becoming is not one thing, and illusion another.🔽Becoming itself is illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o //
translated: Illusion itself is becoming.

original: bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: Blessed One, birth is not one thing, and illusion another.🔽Birth itself is illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o /
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o /
translated: Illusion itself is birth.

original: bcom ldan 'das rga shi yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te /🔽rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rga shi yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te / rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma /
translated: Blessed One, old age and death are not one thing, and illusion another.🔽Old age and death themselves are illusion.

original: sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Illusion itself is old age and death.

original: de nyid kyi rtog pa bzhi pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi rtog pa bzhi pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: This is the fourth conception in that [chapter] that conceives of dependent origination as a designation.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
translated: Are the factors of awakening different from an illusion, and is an illusion different from the factors of awakening?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa lnga pa rnam par byang bar btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa lnga pa rnam par byang bar btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: He replied, “Blessed One, it is not so.” This is the fifth conception in that [chapter] that conceives of purification as a designation.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
translated: Are emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness different from an illusion, and is an illusion different from emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness?”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,🔽“Blessed One, it is not so.”

original: bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med @162b pa yang gzhan la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med @162b pa yang gzhan la /
translated: The Blessed One said, Subhūti, is emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness one thing, and illusion another?

original: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa drug pa mthong ba'i lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa drug pa mthong ba'i lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: This is the sixth conception in that [chapter] that is designated as the path of seeing, and it is a conception.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang gzhan la /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
analyzed: sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
translated: Are the concentrations and formless absorptions one thing, and illusion another?

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bdun pa bsgom pa'i lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bdun pa bsgom pa'i lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no //
translated: Blessed One, it is not so. This is the seventh conception in that [chapter] that is designated as the path of meditation, and it is a conception.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

original: sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
analyzed: sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /

analyzed: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la slob par 'gyur ram /

analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems / nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste /

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so //

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro //

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: gang la 'du shes med cing kun shes pa med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang /
analyzed: gang la 'du shes med cing kun shes pa med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang /
translated: If there is no perception, no cognition, no designation, no convention, no name, no nominal designation, no body, no bodily action,

original: dag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de /
analyzed: dag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de /
translated: no speech, no verbal action, no mind, no mental action, no arising, no cessation, no defilement, and no purification,

original: ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /
analyzed: ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /
translated: would that be training in the perfection of wisdom

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
translated: and would it lead to the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram /
translated: Will they attain the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He replied, “No, Blessed One, they will not.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /
translated: “Subhūti, in that way bodhisattva great beings, having trained in the perfection of wisdom,

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: will go forth to the knowledge of all aspects by way of not apprehending anything.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o //
translated: He said, “Blessed One, if that is the case, bodhisattva great beings training in the perfection of wisdom should train in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening as an illusory person trains.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ste /
translated: Blessed One, one should know that this is an illusory person.

original: 'di lta ste nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams so //
analyzed: 'di lta ste nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams so //
translated: They are these five aggregates.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: What do you think, Subhūti,

original: ci phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: ci phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
translated: do these five aggregates train in the perfection of wisdom and emerge in the knowledge of all aspects?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He said: No, Lord.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Lord, it is because these five grasping heaps are by nature not existent.

original: de bzhin du phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu'o //
translated: Similarly, the five aggregates are like a dream.

original: rmi lam yang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin lags te /
analyzed: rmi lam yang dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin lags te /
translated: A dream is by nature not existent.

original: dmigs su ma mchis @164b so //
analyzed: dmigs su ma mchis @164b so //
translated: It is not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du phung po lnga po dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po lnga po dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: Similarly, the five aggregates, being by nature not existent, are not apprehended.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said:

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: “What do you think, Subhūti,

original: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
analyzed: sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram /
translated: will those five aggregates that are like an echo, like an apparition, like a mirage, like a dream, and like a magical creation train in the perfection of wisdom and go forth to the knowledge of all aspects?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He replied, “No, Lord, they will not.”

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: “Why is it so, Subhūti?”

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: “Lord, it is because a dream is by nature non-existent,

original: sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: an echo is by nature non-existent,

original: de bzhin du mig yor dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du mig yor dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: and likewise an apparition, a mirage, and a magical creation are by nature non-existent.

original: dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: They are not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du phung po lnga po ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis na dmigs su ma mchis so //
analyzed: de bzhin du phung po lnga po ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis na dmigs su ma mchis so //
translated: In the same way, the five aggregates are not apprehended because they are by nature non-existent.”🔽“Subhūti, it is so!

original: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //🔽tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'o // tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Blessed One, form is like an illusion.🔽Feeling is like an illusion.

original: 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Perception is like an illusion.

original: 'du byed rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Formations are like an illusion.

original: rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o //
translated: Consciousness is like an illusion.

original: rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de yang dbang po brug dang phung po lnga'o //🔽de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de yang dbang po brug dang phung po lnga'o // de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so //
translated: That consciousness is the five aggregates.🔽Those are not apprehended by the emptiness of internal phenomena,

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa nas /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa nas /
translated: and are not apprehended by the emptiness of external phenomena, and so on, up to

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mi dmigs so //
translated: the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te de skad du bshad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig mi zhum /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te de skad du bshad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig mi zhum /
translated: Blessed One, if this is explained, then a bodhisattva great being who does not become disheartened,

original: kun tu mi zhum /
analyzed: kun tu mi zhum /
translated: does not become timid,

original: 'gyod par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: 'gyod par mi 'gyur /
translated: does not become regretful,

original: mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag / kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag / kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur na /
translated: does not become afraid, does not become terrified, and is not overcome by fear,

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur /
translated: Blessed One, it is the emergence of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: lam shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: lam shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: It is the emergence of the knowledge of the path.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rjes su thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgu pa mi slob pa'i lam du btags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste 'dzin rtog gnyis pa'o //🔽de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rjes su thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgu pa mi slob pa'i lam du btags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste 'dzin rtog gnyis pa'o // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis /
translated: It is the attainment of the knowledge of all aspects.

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Su­bhūti said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @165a * //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @165a * //
translated: “Blessed One, when the bodhisattva great beings

original: theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos nas zhum zhing kun tu zhum la 'gyod de /
analyzed: theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos nas zhum zhing kun tu zhum la 'gyod de /
translated: who have newly entered the vehicle hear this teaching, they will not be timid, will not be overwhelmed, will not be remorseful,

original: dngang ba dang / kun tu skrag pa dang / kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur lags sam /
analyzed: dngang ba dang / kun tu skrag pa dang / kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur lags sam /
translated: and will not be frightened, terrified, or gripped by terror.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,🔽“Su­bhūti, it is so!

original: sh'a ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na /
translated: Śāriputra, if a bodhisattva great being who has newly set out in the vehicle, who is practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: thabs mi mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song bar ma gyur na ni dngang zhing kun tu skrag la skrag pas zin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thabs mi mkhas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song bar ma gyur na ni dngang zhing kun tu skrag la skrag pas zin par 'gyur ro //
translated: is not in the hands of a spiritual friend, and is not skilled in means, then he will be frightened, become frightened, and seize up with fear.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /🔽bcom ldan 'das gang la spyod pas mi dngang /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das gang la spyod pas mi dngang /
translated: Subhūti asked,🔽“Blessed One, what is the skillful means of a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom, practicing with which they are not frightened,

original: kun tu mi skrag / kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags /
analyzed: kun tu mi skrag / kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags /
translated: do not become frightened, and do not seize up with fear?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied,

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Subhūti, here when bodhisattva great beings are practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
translated: “With a mind endowed with omniscience, they discern that form is impermanent, but they do not apprehend it.🔽“With a mind endowed with omniscience, they discern that feeling is impermanent, but they do not apprehend it.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
translated: “With a mind endowed with omniscience, they discern that perception is impermanent, but they do not apprehend it.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed rnams mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed rnams mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
translated: “With a mind endowed with omniscience, they discern that volitional factors are impermanent, but they do not apprehend them.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
translated: “With a mind endowed with omniscience, they discern that consciousness is impermanent, but they do not apprehend it.

original: rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, that should be known as the skillful means of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings with a thought connected with the knowledge of all aspects

original: gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya sar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya sar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
translated: individually know that ‘form is suffering,’ but they do not apprehend that.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems @165b kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems @165b kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
translated: With a thought connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they individually know that ‘feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are suffering,’ but they do not apprehend that.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang /
translated: investigate form as selfless, investigate form as calm, investigate form as void,

original: gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
translated: investigate form as empty, investigate form as signless, investigate form as wishless, but do not apprehend it.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so //
translated: With a thought endowed with the knowledge of all aspects they investigate feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness as empty, but do not apprehend it.

original: rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
translated: “Consciousness is not a self,” “consciousness is calm,” “consciousness is void,” “consciousness is signless,”🔽“consciousness is without wishes,” “consciousness is unafflicted,” “consciousness is unproduced,” “consciousness is unceasing,” “consciousness is empty,” “consciousness is without outflows,” “consciousness is isolated,” “consciousness is non-arisen,” and “consciousness is non-ceased.”🔽“Consciousness is not a self,” “consciousness is calm,” “consciousness is void,” “consciousness is signless,”🔽“consciousness is without wishes,” “consciousness is unafflicted,” “consciousness is unproduced,” “consciousness is unceasing,” “consciousness is empty,” “consciousness is without outflows,” “consciousness is isolated,” “consciousness is non-arisen,” and “consciousness is non-ceased.”🔽“Consciousness is not a self,” “consciousness is calm,” “consciousness is void,” “consciousness is signless,”🔽“consciousness is without wishes,” “consciousness is unafflicted,” “consciousness is unproduced,” “consciousness is unceasing,” “consciousness is empty,” “consciousness is without outflows,” “consciousness is isolated,” “consciousness is non-arisen,” and “consciousness is non-ceased.”🔽“Consciousness is not a self,” “consciousness is calm,” “consciousness is void,” “consciousness is signless,”🔽“consciousness is without wishes,” “consciousness is unafflicted,” “consciousness is unproduced,” “consciousness is unceasing,” “consciousness is empty,” “consciousness is without outflows,” “consciousness is isolated,” “consciousness is non-arisen,” and “consciousness is non-ceased.”🔽“Consciousness is not a self,” “consciousness is calm,” “consciousness is void,” “consciousness is signless,”🔽“consciousness is without wishes,” “consciousness is unafflicted,” “consciousness is unproduced,” “consciousness is unceasing,” “consciousness is empty,” “consciousness is without outflows,” “consciousness is isolated,” “consciousness is non-arisen,” and “consciousness is non-ceased.”

original: rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de dmigs so //
translated: “Consciousness is not a self,” “consciousness is calm,” “consciousness is void,” “consciousness is signless,”

original: rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o //🔽rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “consciousness is without wishes,” “consciousness is unafflicted,” “consciousness is unproduced,” “consciousness is unceasing,” “consciousness is empty,” “consciousness is without outflows,” “consciousness is isolated,” “consciousness is non-arisen,” and “consciousness is non-ceased.”🔽“Consciousness is not a self,” “consciousness is calm,” “consciousness is void,” “consciousness

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul du chos stan pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul du chos stan pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: That teaching of the Dharma by way of nonapprehending with attention connected with the knowledge of all modes is the Bodhisattva’s perfection of giving.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa nyid gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi bzod pa dang / 'dod pa dang so sor rtog pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa nyid gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi bzod pa dang / 'dod pa dang so sor rtog pa gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: That non-grasping of those very attentions connected with the knowledge of all modes is the Bodhisattva’s perfection of morality.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
translated: That patience, that willingness, that discernment of those very attentions connected with the knowledge of all modes is the Bodhisattva’s perfection of patience.

original: @166a * // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi de mi 'dor ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: @166a * // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi de mi 'dor ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The steadfastness of those who have the mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, and who do not give up on that, is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of perseverance.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa'am /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa'am /
translated: The steadfastness of those who have the mental activity associated with the knowledge of all aspects, and who do not give an opportunity to the mental activity associated with the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels,

original: mi dge ba'i chos gzhan gyis skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos gzhan gyis skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: or to any other nonvirtuous dharmas, is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of concentration.

original: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom like that

original: mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag / kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ro /
analyzed: mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag / kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ro /
translated: do not tremble, are not frightened, and are not terrified.

original: // / bam po bcu gnyis pa /
analyzed: // / bam po bcu gnyis pa /
translated: Chapter : The Perfection of Wisdom

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Subhūti, furthermore, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste /
translated: with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, they thoroughly investigate in the following manner:

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Form is not empty because of the emptiness of form.

original: gzugs nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: Form itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so //
translated: Emptiness itself is form.

original: tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Feeling is not empty because of the emptiness of feeling.

original: tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Feeling itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is feeling.

original: 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Perception is not empty because of the emptiness of perception.

original: 'du shes nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: 'du shes nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Perception itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid 'du shes so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid 'du shes so //
translated: Emptiness itself is perception.

original: 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Formations are not empty because of the emptiness of formations.

original: 'du byed rnams nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Formations are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid 'du byed rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid 'du byed rnams so //

original: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Consciousness is not empty because of the emptiness of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid de /
translated: Consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa'o //

original: mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi /

original: mig nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: mig nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The eye itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid mig go //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid mig go //

original: rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The ear is not empty because of the emptiness of the ear.

original: rna ba nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rna ba nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The ear itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the ear.

original: sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽sna nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gyi / sna nyid stong pa nyid /

original: stong pa nyid nyid sna'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid sna'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the nose.

original: lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽lce nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi / lce nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The tongue is not empty because of the emptiness of the tongue.🔽The tongue itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid @166b lce'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid @166b lce'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the tongue.

original: lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽lus nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi / lus nyid stong pa nyid /
