original: stong pa nyid nyid lus so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid lus so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the body.

original: yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽yid nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi / yid nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: It is not that the mind is empty because of the emptiness of the mind.🔽The mind itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid yid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid yid do //
translated: Emptiness itself is the mind.

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that form is empty because of the emptiness of form.

original: gzugs nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: gzugs nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Form itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so //
translated: Emptiness itself is form.

original: sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽sgra nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi / sgra nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: It is not that sound is empty because of the emptiness of sound.🔽Sound itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid sgra'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid sgra'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is sound.

original: dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽dri nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi / dri nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: It is not that smell is empty because of the emptiness of smell.🔽Smell itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid dri'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid dri'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is smell.

original: ro'i stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽ro nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: ro'i stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa ma yin gyi / ro nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: It is not that taste is empty because of the emptiness of taste.🔽Taste itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid ro'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid ro'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is taste.

original: reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that touch is empty because of the emptiness of touch.

original: reg nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: reg nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Touch itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid reg go //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid reg go //
translated: It is emptiness itself that is touched.

original: chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽chos nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi / chos nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: A phenomenon is not empty because of the emptiness of a phenomenon.🔽The emptiness of a phenomenon is the emptiness of a phenomenon.

original: stong pa nyid nyid chos so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid chos so //
translated: It is emptiness itself that is a phenomenon.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of eye consciousness is not the emptiness of eye consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Eye consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: It is emptiness itself that is eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of ear consciousness is not the emptiness of ear consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: Ear consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: It is emptiness itself that is ear consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi / sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of nose consciousness is not the emptiness of nose consciousness.🔽Nose consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: It is emptiness itself that is nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the emptiness of the tongue consciousness is empty of the tongue consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The tongue consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the emptiness of the body consciousness is empty of the body consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The body consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o//
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o//
translated: Emptiness itself is the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the emptiness of the mind consciousness is empty of the mind consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The mind consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽mig gi @167a * //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi / mig gi @167a * //
translated: It is not that the emptiness of eye contact is empty of eye contact.

original: 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The eye contact itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the eyes is not the eyes.🔽The emptiness of the ears is not the ears.🔽The emptiness of the nose is not the nose.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of the tongue is not the tongue.🔽The emptiness of the body is not the body.🔽The emptiness of the mind is not the mind.🔽The emptiness of form is not form.🔽The emptiness of sound is not sound.🔽The emptiness of smell is not smell.🔽The emptiness of taste is not taste.

original: stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of touch is not touch.🔽The emptiness of mental phenomena is not mental phenomena.🔽The emptiness of the eye consciousness is not the eye consciousness.🔽The emptiness of the ear consciousness is not the ear consciousness.🔽The emptiness of the nose consciousness is not the nose consciousness.🔽The emptiness of the tongue consciousness is not the tongue consciousness.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /🔽stong pa nyid nyid sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid / stong pa nyid nyid sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the body consciousness is not the body consciousness.🔽The emptiness of the mind consciousness is not the mind consciousness.🔽The emptiness of the eye contact is not the eye contact.🔽The emptiness of the ear contact is not the ear contact.🔽The emptiness of the nose contact is not the nose contact.🔽The emptiness of the tongue contact is not the tongue contact.🔽The emptiness of the body contact is not the body contact.🔽The emptiness of the mind contact is not the mind contact.🔽The emptiness of the feeling that arises from eye contact is not the feeling that arises from eye contact.🔽The emptiness of the feeling that arises from ear contact is not the feeling that arises from ear contact.🔽The emptiness of the feeling that arises from nose contact is not the feeling that arises from nose contact.🔽The emptiness of the feeling that arises from tongue contact is not the feeling that arises from tongue contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi / lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of the feeling that arises from body contact is not the feeling that arises from body contact.🔽The emptiness of the feeling that arises from mind contact is not the feeling that arises from mind contact.🔽The emptiness of the perception of form is not the perception of form.🔽The emptiness of the perception of sound is not the perception of sound.

original: stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the perception of smell is not the perception of smell.🔽The emptiness of the perception of taste is not the perception of taste.🔽The emptiness of the perception of touch is not the perception of touch.🔽The emptiness of the perception of mental phenomena is not the perception of mental phenomena.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of the intention of form is not the intention of form.🔽The

original: stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the aggregate of mental formations is not the mental formations.🔽The emptiness of the sense-sphere of the mental faculty is not the sense-sphere of the mental faculty.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of the element of the mental faculty is not the element of the mental faculty.🔽The emptiness of the aggregate of consciousness is not consciousness.🔽The emptiness of the sense-sphere of mental objects is not mental objects.🔽The emptiness of the element of mental objects is not mental objects.

original: stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: The emptiness of the aggregate of mental formations is not the mental formations.🔽The emptiness of the sense-sphere of the mental faculty is not the sense-sphere of the mental faculty.🔽The emptiness of the element of the mental faculty is not the element of the mental faculty.🔽The emptiness of the aggregate of consciousness is not consciousness.🔽The emptiness of the sense-sphere of mental objects is not mental objects.🔽The emptiness of the element of mental objects is not mental objects.🔽The emptiness of the aggregate of mental formations is not the mental formations.🔽The emptiness of the sense-sphere of the mental faculty is not the sense-sphere of the mental faculty.🔽The emptiness of the element of the mental faculty is not the element of the mental faculty.🔽The emptiness of the aggregate of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the sense-sphere of mental objects is not mental objects.🔽The emptiness of the element of mental objects is not mental objects.🔽The emptiness of the aggregate of mental formations is not the mental formations.🔽The emptiness of the sense-sphere of the mental faculty is not the sense-sphere of the mental faculty.🔽The emptiness of the element of the mental faculty is not the element of the mental faculty.🔽The emptiness of the aggregate of consciousness is not consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid /🔽stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid / stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: The emptiness of the sense-sphere of mental objects is not mental objects.🔽The emptiness of the element of mental objects is not mental objects.🔽The emptiness of the aggregate of mental formations is not the mental formations.🔽The emptiness of the sense-sphere of the mental faculty is not the sense-sphere of the mental faculty.🔽The emptiness of the element of the mental faculty is not the element of the mental faculty.🔽The emptiness of the aggregate of consciousness is not consciousness.🔽The emptiness of the sense-sphere of mental objects is not mental objects.🔽The emptiness of the element of mental objects is not mental objects.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The emptiness of the aggregate of mental formations is not the mental formations.🔽The emptiness

original: stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: the emptiness of the nose is not the nose,🔽the emptiness of the tongue is not the tongue,🔽the emptiness of the body is not the body,🔽the emptiness of the mental faculty is not the mental faculty.🔽“The emptiness of the visual faculty is not the visual faculty,🔽the emptiness of the auditory faculty is not the auditory faculty,🔽the emptiness of the olfactory faculty is not the olfactory faculty,🔽the emptiness of the gustatory faculty is not the gustatory faculty,🔽the emptiness of the tactile faculty is not the tactile faculty,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: the emptiness of the mental faculty is not the mental faculty.🔽“The emptiness of form is not form,🔽the emptiness of sound is not sound,🔽the emptiness of smell is not smell,🔽the emptiness of taste is not taste,

original: stong pa nyid nyid sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: the emptiness of tactility is not tactility,🔽the emptiness of mental objects is not mental objects.🔽“The emptiness of the eye consciousness is not the eye consciousness,🔽the emptiness of the ear consciousness is not the ear consciousness,🔽the emptiness of the nose consciousness is not the nose consciousness,🔽the emptiness of the tongue consciousness is not the tongue consciousness,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: the emptiness of the body consciousness is not the body consciousness,🔽the emptiness of the mind consciousness is not the mind consciousness.🔽“The emptiness of the eye contact is not the eye contact,🔽the emptiness of the ear contact is not the ear contact,🔽the emptiness of the nose contact is not the nose contact,🔽the emptiness of the tongue contact is not the tongue contact,🔽the emptiness of the body contact is not the body contact,🔽the emptiness of the mental contact is not the mental contact.🔽“The emptiness of the feeling that arises from eye contact is not the feeling that arises from eye contact,🔽the emptiness of the feeling that arises from ear contact is not the feeling that arises from ear contact,🔽the emptiness of the feeling that arises from nose contact is not the feeling that arises from nose contact,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: the emptiness of the feeling that arises from tongue contact is not the feeling that arises from tongue contact,🔽the emptiness of the feeling that arises from body contact is not the feeling that arises from body contact,🔽the emptiness of the feeling that arises from mental contact is not the feeling that arises from mental contact.🔽“The emptiness of the craving for the feeling that arises from eye contact is not the craving for the feeling that arises from eye contact,

original: stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o//
translated: the emptiness of the craving for the feeling that arises from ear contact

original: @167b lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: @167b lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of body and tactile stimuli is empty because of the emptiness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of body and tactile stimuli.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of body and tactile stimuli is itself emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of body and tactile stimuli.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of mental stimuli and mind is empty because of the emptiness of the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of mental stimuli and mind.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of mental stimuli and mind is itself emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the feeling that arises from the condition of contact through the union of mental stimuli and mind.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the applications of mindfulness are empty because of the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: The applications of mindfulness are themselves emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the application of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams kyang de bzhin te /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams kyang de bzhin te /
translated: The same applies to the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, and the powers.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid stong pa nyid /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa ma yin gyi / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid stong pa nyid /
translated: It is not that the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment are empty of the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment,🔽but rather that the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment.

original: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: “Subhūti, this is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /🔽skrag par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni / skrag par mi 'gyur /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom like that🔽will not be afraid,

original: kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur /
translated: will not be terrified,🔽and will not be overcome with terror.

original: kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang po thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa yin no //
analyzed: kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang po thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa yin no //
translated: This is the first embracing, namely, skill in means.

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis yongs su bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa thos nas mi dngang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis yongs su bzung bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa thos nas mi dngang /
translated: “Lord, what are the bodhisattva great beings’ spiritual friends, through being embraced by whom they do not tremble, are not frightened or terrified, when they hear this exposition of the perfection of wisdom?

original: kun tu mi skrag / kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags /
analyzed: kun tu mi skrag / kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags /
translated: What are the bodhisattva great beings’ spiritual friends?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs @168a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs @168a * //
translated: “Subhūti, here the bodhisattva great beings’ spiritual friends are those who, in regard to form, teach the doctrine that it is impermanent, in a way that does not apprehend anything,🔽and who, in regard to those wholesome roots, teach the doctrine that they are not a self, not a being, not a life-force, not a creature, not a human, not a person, not a descendant of Manu, not a woman, not a man, not an owner of karma, not an experiencer of karma, and that they are not something to be appropriated, in a way that does not apprehend anything.

original: par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: nor does he let them get involved with the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: He teaches the doctrine to them in such a way that they do not apprehend the aggregates as impermanent,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa ste /
translated: and he does not let those wholesome roots get involved with the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level, except for the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, you should know that this is a bodhisattva great being’s spiritual friend.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, a bodhisattva great being’s spiritual friend

original: gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
analyzed: gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
translated: “They teach the doctrine that form is suffering, and that form is not apprehended.🔽They teach the doctrine that form is selfless, and that form is not apprehended.🔽They teach the doctrine that form is calm, and that form is not apprehended.🔽They teach the doctrine that form is empty, and that form is not apprehended.

original: smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am /
analyzed: smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am /
translated: They teach the doctrine that form is signless, and that form is not apprehended.🔽They teach the doctrine that form is wishless, and that form is not apprehended.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa dang / gang de la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa dang / gang de la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang /
translated: They teach the doctrine that feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are suffering, and that consciousness is not apprehended.

original: rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa ste /
translated: “Form is empty” and “emptiness is form,” and similarly, “feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are empty,” and similarly, “the constituents, the sense fields, the perfections, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the ten powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and also the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are empty,” and similarly, “the fruit of stream enterer, the fruit of once-returner, the fruit of non-returner, the fruit of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, and also unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening are empty,” and similarly, “all dharmas are empty,” and similarly, “all buddhas are empty,” and similarly, “all sentient beings are empty.”🔽Subhūti, this is the bodhisattva great beings’ spiritual friend, spiritual preceptor, and spiritual companion.🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should attend on, serve, and honor spiritual friends and spiritual preceptors like that.”🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should attend on, serve, and honor spiritual friends and spiritual preceptors like that.”

original: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o //
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should attend on, serve, and honor spiritual friends and spiritual preceptors like that.”🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should attend on, serve, and honor spiritual friends and spiritual preceptors like that.”🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should attend on, serve, and honor spiritual friends and spiritual preceptors like that.”🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should attend on, serve, and honor spiritual friends and spiritual preceptors like that.”🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should attend on, serve, and honor spiritual friends and spiritual preceptors like that.”🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should attend on, serve, and honor spiritual friends and spiritual preceptors like that.”🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should attend on, serve, and honor spiritual friends and spiritual preceptors like that.”🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should attend on, serve, and honor spiritual friends and spiritual preceptors like that.”🔽“Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings should attend on, serve, and honor spiritual friends and spiritual preceptors like that.”🔽“Subh

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya @168b ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya @168b ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
translated: They teach the doctrine that it is suffering, that it is nonself,🔽that it is empty, that it is signless, that it is wishless, and they do so by way of not apprehending anything.

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: And they dedicate all those wholesome roots to the knowledge of all aspects, but not to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa dang / gang de la rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa dang / gang de la rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang /
translated: “They teach the doctrine that the ear, nose, tongue, body, and thinking mind are impermanent, that they are painful, that they are selfless,🔽that they are calm, that they are void, that they are purified, that they are afflicted, and that they are purified, and they do so for the sake of all beings, and they do not include those wholesome roots in the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level, except when they are teaching the doctrine that all dharmas are empty, signless, and wishless, and that they are isolated, calm, and essentially nonexistent.🔽“They teach the doctrine that form is impermanent, that it is painful, that it is selfless,🔽that it is calm, that it is void, that it is purified, that it is afflicted, and that it is purified, and they do not include those wholesome roots in the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level, except when they are teaching the doctrine that all dharmas are empty, signless, and wishless, and that they are isolated, calm, and essentially nonexistent.🔽“They teach the doctrine that feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are impermanent, that they are painful, that they are selfless,

original: zhi zhes bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
